title: Sk8-Hi Waterproof Insulated Shoe
subtitle: Cold-weather classic.
short_description: Rainy days. Cold days. This winter-ready Sk8-Hi keeps you warm and comfortable through it all.
style_description: Winter days are unpredictable, but the Sk8-Hi Waterproof is ready for anything. Featuring HydroGuard 360º waterproofing, 100-gram Primaloft insulation and an All-Trac outsole, this cold-weather classic keeps you warm and comfortable—no matter what the forecast throws your way.
details: Leather, suede, and 100% recycled textile upper Hydroguard® 360º waterproof package for reliable protection in wet conditions 100-gram Primaloft® pure insulation package keeps your feet warm in cold temperatures Ultracush™ drop-in footbed for all-day comfort and support Durable all-trac rubber for multi-surface traction in various terrain and conditions. This brand new compound contains a blend of at least 30% recycled rubber and regenerative rubber that is sourced from farms utilizing agricultural practices that are intended to promote biodiversity, enhance water cycles, improve soil health, and/or sequester carbon Part of our MTE™—Made for the Elements—collection, built for water protection, thermal regulation, and traction when you need it most Contains 30% regenerative rubber and recycled ingredients Regeneratively grown natural rubber sourced is from farms utilizing agricultural practices that are intended to promote biodiversity, enhance water cycles, improve soil health and/or sequester carbon

title: Sk8-Hi GORE-TEX Insulated Shoe
subtitle: Cold-weather classic.
short_description: The iconic Sk8-Hi, now reinforced with GORE-TEX waterproofing and Duratherm insulation.
style_description: When the weather goes from good to bad, the Sk8-Hi GORE-TEX is there for you. This insulated take on our Classic high-top silhouette has everything you need to take on winter—breathable GORE-TEX waterproofing, 200-gram Duratherm insulation and a grippy All-Trac outsole.
details: Leather, suede, and 100% recycled textile upper PFAS-free GORE-TEX® waterproof package for the best wet-weather protection 200-gram PFAS-free GORE-TEX® Duratherm insulation package for reliable warmth in cold temperatures Ultracush™ drop-in footbed for all-day comfort and support Durable All-Trac rubber compound provides multi-surface traction. This brand new compound contains a blend of at least 30% recycled rubber and regenerative rubber that is sourced from farms utilizing agricultural practices that are intended to promote biodiversity, enhance water cycles, improve soil health, and/or sequester carbon Part of our MTE™—Made for the Elements—collection, built for water protection, thermal regulation, and traction when you need it most Contains 30% regenerative rubber and recycled ingredients Regeneratively grown natural rubber sourced is from farms utilizing agricultural practices that are intended to promote biodiversity, enhance water cycles, improve soil health and/or sequester carbon

title: Authentic Shoe
subtitle: The original since ‘66.
short_description: The longest running style in the Vans lineup, the Authentic is where it all started.
style_description: The Authentic is the original Vans silhouette. First introduced in 1966 and driven forward by creative culture ever since, this time-honored shoe keeps the old school vibe alive with sturdy canvas uppers in seasonal colorways. With its classic low-top design and iconic rubber waffle outsole, the Authentic is a blank canvas for creativity that allows you to do your thing in your own unique way.
details: Low-top shoe Canvas upper for a durable and classic look Unpadded, low-profile cuff for a minimalist fit Metal eyelets. Four on sizes 3.5 - 6 and five on sizes 6.5+ Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Knu Skool Shoe
subtitle: In With The Knu.
short_description: Oversized laces and puffed-up ’90s attitude on Vans’ signature sole.
style_description: Born in ’98, the Knu Skool took inspiration from the iconic Old Skool to create something entirely its own. Oversized laces, a puffed tongue, and a plush collar captured unapologetic ’90s style, all grounded on Vans’ signature vulcanized sole.
details: Reissued '90s low-top shoe Suede upper for a soft, textured finish Oversized tongue and padded collar for extra comfort Wide laces for bold style and adjustable, secure fit Heel pulls for ease of entry Puffy 3D Sidestripe™ blends throwback style with a modern edge Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Super Lowpro Shoe
subtitle: Retro versatility.
short_description: Inspired by our '80s Serio Collection. Blending retro style with a modern edge.
style_description: The Super Lowpro revives a low-profile legacy, taking cues from the sleek, low-to-the-ground profiles of ’80s runners and flats. Inspired by the Serio Style 84, it channels our past foray into athletic footwear–blending heritage design with everyday versatility. Lightweight and built to move, it stays true to Vans’ legacy of pushing beyond the board.
details: Low-profile, vintage track-inspired sneakers Inspired by ’80s Serio Style 84 OrthoLite® foam insole for cushioning Shock-absorbing EVA midsole provides cushioning without added weight Leather and suede upper for elevated durability Padded tongue adds comfort and support Perforation details on the sides add texture and a retro touch Heel mustache improves support while adding a subtle design detail Minimal lining for a soft, barely-there feel Heritage “Serio” branding on the tongue Two-layer SideStripe™ panels for a small color hit Cupsole construction provides enhanced support and durability Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit

title: Old Skool Shoe
subtitle: Lifestyle, Original Icon, Leather, Lightweight Canvas
short_description: Est. '77 Feel Something New.
style_description: The birth of our iconic SideStripe™, there’s always something new with the Old Skool.
details: The Old Skool was our first footwear design to showcase the famous Vans Sidestripe, although back then, it was just a random doodle drawn by founder Paul Van Doren. Since its debut in 1977, this low-top silhouette has established itself as an icon in the skate, music, and fashion scenes. From 90s street skaters and punks to current hip hop and fashion legends, the Old Skool Canvas has consistently been the go-to shoe for creatives who do things their own way.

title: Toddler Old Skool V Shoe
subtitle: Est. '77 Feel Something New.
short_description: The birth of our iconic SideStripe™, there’s always something new with the Old Skool.
style_description: The Toddler Old Skool V reimagines our iconic Sidestripe shoe by swapping traditional laces for double hook-and-loop closures. Featuring our signature checkerboard print, this low-top style maintains its classic appeal while providing an easy, secure fit that keeps your little one comfortable all day.
details: Toddler low-top shoe Recommended for ages 9 months to 4 years Sturdy suede and canvas uppers Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Double hook-and-loop closures for easy on-and-off Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

subtitle: Heritage meets motion.

Grounded by our iconic Sidestripe™, this trainer bridges retro styling with everyday wearability, proving that timeless design always moves forward.

Designed in collaboration with artist Kenny Wong and POP MART, this cosmic take features soft pastel tones and galactic-inspired detailing throughout. A metallic silver Sidestripe adds a futuristic edge, while pink and green accents along the foxing stripe glow with playful contrast. Hidden SPACE MOLLY graphics peek through the translucent outsole, completing a look that’s ready to orbit beyond ordinary street style.

title: OTW by Vans X WTAPS X OAMC Sk8-Hi GL Lug
subtitle: Designed to disrupt.
short_description: Utilitarian cues and elevated craftsmanship evolve a Vans icon through the lens of WTAPS and OAMC.
style_description: Vans' iconic hi-top skate shoe gets a rugged reimagining from OAMC and WTAPS with thick duck canvas and highly functional details. The Sidestripe is turned into a functional eyestay detail referencing MOLLE webbing. Dual laces feature “Milan” and “Tokyo” aglets for a subtle cultural nod, while thick foxing and rubber overlays add durability. A co-branded leather footbed ensures all-day comfort and a V-lug outsole adds traction and grip. Finished with WTAPS, OAMC, and OTW branding and custom packaging, this is a rugged, take everywhere shoe designed with global insights.
details: Iconic hi-top skate shoe originally known as Style 38 Rugged 12 oz duck canvas upper adds structure and texture Co-branded Vans X OAMC X WTAPS tongue WTAPS X OAMC hangflag "10-25" detail on outside of upper references standardized communication code meaning ‘Report to’ Side stripe reimagined as a functional eyestay, integrating MOLLE webbing references Dual lace options include a primary cotton lace with “Milan” and “Tokyo” aglet prints, plus a flat tonal secondary lace Monochromatic eyelets Thick foxing with creeper toe bumper Rubber patch overlays extended onto upper Co-branded OTW by Vans X OAMC X WTAPS leather footbed Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased OTW logo heel scab V-lug outsole for durability and grip Custom packaging

title: Little Kids Sk8-Hi Water Resistant Gum Shoe
subtitle: Keep dry. Keep up.
short_description: Their favorite high-tops, now ready for anything with a water-resistant upper.
style_description: The Sk8-Hi is an all-time classic, but the Kids Sk8-Hi takes it a step further with adventure in mind. Featuring a water-resistant suede upper, Primaloft insulation and an outsole designed for superior traction, you get a shoe that can truly keep up in cold and wet conditions.
details: Water-resistant upper for reliable, comfortable, breathable moisture management protection. Primaloft insulation package traps warmth without retaining internal moisture. Lugged outsole incorporates multi-directional treads, multi-level surfacing, and a siped tire-like design for increased traction in wet conditions. Single-density UltraCush molded EVA footbed provides enhanced comfort for all-day wear.

Lugged outsole incorporates multi-directional treads, multi-level surfacing, and a siped tire-like design for increased traction in wet conditions. Single-density UltraCush molded EVA footbed provides enhanced comfort for all-day wear.

title: OTW by Vans X WTAPS X OAMC Seylynn
subtitle: Designed to disrupt.
short_description: Recognizable Vans DNA with utilitarian cues and refined craftsmanship from WTAPS and OAMC.
style_description: This shoe blends soft suede with refined utility, grounded in the collaborative vision of Vans, OAMC, and WTAPS. A co-branded tongue and 10-25 code on the foxing reference tactical communication, while dual lace options featuring “Milan” and “Tokyo” aglets add global depth. Monochromatic eyelets and a creeper toe bumper elevate the design’s minimal utilitarian aesthetic. Underfoot, a leather footbed and cushioned insole provide soft, all-day cushioning, anchored by a V-lug outsole for durable traction.
details: Reissue of the Seylynn from Vans' archival syndicate collection Suede upper for a soft, textured finish Co-branded Vans X OAMC X WTAPS tongue "10-25" detail on outside of upper references standardized communication code meaning ‘Report to’ Thick foxing with creeper toe bumper Dual lace options include a primary cotton lace with “Milan” and “Tokyo” aglet prints, plus a flat tonal secondary lace Monochromatic eyelets Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Co-branded OTW by Vans X OAMC X WTAPS leather footbed OTW logo heel scab V-lug outsole for durability and grip Custom packaging

subtitle: Ready for winter.

subtitle: Legend on canvas.

Martial arts heritage fuses with Vans’ iconic Southern California energy, highlighted by the Okamura artwork across the top, a bold red outsole symbolizing power and vitality, and classic Slip-On details including a durable canvas upper, padded collar, elastic side panels, and Vans’ signature waffle outsole. As part of the Van Doren Approved collection, it celebrates individuality, creativity, and the enduring impact of Gerald Okamura on culture and self-expression.

title: Sk8-Hi Shoe
subtitle: The original skate hi-top
short_description: Established in 1978, the Sk8-Hi is classic on any stage.
style_description: High-tops changed the sneaker game, and the Vans Style #38 was at the forefront of the revolution. Now beloved as the Sk8-Hi sneaker, this legendary high-top shoe blazed trails from the beginning. The sturdy suede and canvas uppers allow for maximum attitude. The foundation? Say hello to reinforced toe caps, supportive padded collars, and our signature rubber waffle outsoles. This classic Sk8-Hi shoe is as innovative today as it was in 1978, and every bit as groundbreaking. Tapping into our heritage, the Black & White Sk8-Hi has it all.
details: Legendary high-top, Sidestripe shoe Durable suede and canvas uppers Lace-up closure Reinforced toe caps Supportive padded collars Signature rubber waffle outsoles Classic Sk8-Hi

title: Old Skool Wide Shoe
subtitle: Est. '77 Feel Something New.
short_description: The birth of our iconic SideStripe™, there’s always something new with the Old Skool.
style_description: The Old Skool was our first footwear design to showcase the famous Vans Sidestripe, although back then, it was just a simple doodle drawn by founder Paul Van Doren. Since its debut in 1977, this low-top silhouette has established itself as an icon in the skate, music, and fashion scenes. From 90s street skaters and punks to current hip hop and fashion legends, the Old Skool has consistently been the go-to shoe for creatives who do things their own way. With the Old Skool Wide, this iconic shoe offers even more room for a relaxed fit. Wide width sizes provide a spacious platform by a bottom width that is 5mm wider and a ball girth that is 10mm longer than our regular width sizes.
details: Iconic low-top, Sidestripe shoe Wide construction Durable suede and canvas uppers Lace-up closure Reinforced toe caps Supportive padded collars Signature rubber waffle outsoles Classic Old Skool

title: Skate Old Skool Shoe
subtitle: Sidestripe™ icon, refined for skating.
short_description: Updated for skateboarding, Skate Classics are built tough, grip hard and land soft.
style_description: Completely redesigned for modern skateboarding, the Skate Classics collection delivers more of what skateboarders need to enable maximum progression. Made with classic suede and canvas uppers, the Skate Old Skool gives you the iconic look you want while bringing all the performance benefits skateboarders demand. A wardrobe staple of the skateboarding community for decades, these Skate Old Skools were featured in Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4, cementing their place in skateboarding forever.
details: Iconic low top shoe Canvas and suede upper layers two textures As seen in Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 DuraCap™ is a thin rubber underlay designed specifically for skateboarding, placed in key areas to protect against griptape wear Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Padded collar for support and comfort A molded heel counter provides structure support, improving stability and fit Internal tongue straps prevents it from sliding during movement SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

short_description: Updated for BMX, it's a classic built for the bike.
style_description: The BMX Old Skool has been formulated for modern riding. With an iconic look, maximum pedal feel, and enhanced cushioning, this vulcanized low-top silhouette offers unrivaled BMX innovation to support your progression.
details: Flat pedal BMX/MTB low top shoe Designed for riding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede, 6 oz canvas and mesh upper blends durability with comfort Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit DURACAP™ underlays add reinforcement to high-wear areas PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended riding Wafflecup™ combines cupsole support and durability with vulcanized pedal feel and flexibility VDFPR (Van Doren Factory Pedal Recipe) rubber sole delivers enhanced pedal grip and durability Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: BMX Sk8-Hi Shoe
subtitle: Est. 1978, taking it higher.
short_description: Updated for BMX, Skate Classics are built tough, grip hard and land soft.
style_description: The BMX Sk8-Hi has been formulated for modern riding. With an iconic look, maximum pedal feel, and enhanced cushioning, this vulcanized high-top silhouette offers unrivaled BMX innovation to support your progression.
details: Flat pedal BMX/MTB high top shoe Designed for riding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede, 10 oz canvas and mesh upper blends durability with comfort Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit DURACAP™ underlays add reinforcement to high-wear areas PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended riding Wafflecup™ combines cupsole support and durability with vulcanized pedal feel and flexibility VDFPR (Van Doren Factory Pedal Recipe) rubber sole delivers enhanced pedal grip and durability Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Skate Slip-On Shoe
subtitle: No lace. Built to skate.
short_description: Updated for skateboarding, Skate Classics are built tough, grip hard and land soft.
style_description: Completely redesigned for modern skateboarding, the Skate Classics collection delivers more of what skateboarders need to enable maximum progression. Made with classic suede and canvas uppers, the Skate Slip-On gives you the iconic look you want while bringing all the performance benefits skateboarders demand.
details: Skate low top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Elastic side panels give a comfortable easy on-and-off fit Suede and 10 oz canvas upper for a durable and classic look Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort A molded heel counter provides structure support, improving stability and fit PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended skating DURACAP™ underlays add reinforcement to high-wear areas SickStick™ rubber waffle outsole provides maximum grip and traction on your board Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Skate Kyle Walker Wafflecup Shoe
subtitle: Pro-level performance.
short_description: Classic style, optimal comfort and skate-ready durability. Just how Kyle likes it.
style_description: Hailing from ''Tornado Alley'' Oklahoma, Kyle Walker was bred on grit, and his introductory signature model, the Skate Kyle Walker, is exactly the shoe you need to push your skating. This vulcanized skate shoe features a classic look, optimal comfort and the grip and durability you need for nonstop progression.
details: Signature low-top skate shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather upper for a smooth, durable finish PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity Padded collar for support and comfort Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Kyle Walker patch Cupsole construction provides enhanced support and durability Wafflecup™ combines cupsole support and durability with vulcanized board feel and flexibility Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit

title: Aura OG Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Custom fit made easy.
short_description: A lightweight and responsive boot designed with speed and simplicity in mind.
style_description: The Aura OG is a lightweight and responsive snowboard boot ready for all riders in all terrain. Optimized for versatility from parks to powder and everything in between the speed and simplicity of its single-dial BOA Fit System makes precise, on-the-fly adjustability easy no matter where you go, while the V1 Waffle Lug outsole and classic Sidestripe add original and unmistakable Vans style. It is normal for V-Series liners to fit snug right out of the box. After several hours of use, the dual-density, heat-moldable core of the liner will begin to shape to your foot, creating unparalleled comfort and a uniquely perfect fit. We recommend that you purchase your regular size.
details: All-mountain boot optimized for versatility from parks to powder and everything in between Flex rating: 4-5 Skill level: beginner to intermediate V1 UltraCush™ Liner features an UltraCush™ interior layer, a dual-density heat-moldable core for customized fit, a comfort flex neoprene toe box, and a closed-seam brushed fleece cuff PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Our V1 Harness is our lightest and simplest harness, designed to ensure effective support and heel hold when paired with our V1 liner Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions BOA® Fit System provides a precision fit with on-the-fly micro-adjustability

title: Premium Authentic Shoe
subtitle: Classic style. Premium build.
short_description: Our original silhouette, upgraded with enhanced cushioning and an improved fit.
style_description: Born in 1966, the Authentic set the standard for clean, functional design. This premium build stays true to its roots while stepping things up with a lightweight canvas upper, a refined fit, and a cushioned insole for lasting comfort and a softer step. It’s a new level of wearability for a timeless original.
details: Heritage low top shoes 8 oz canvas upper for a light but durable finish Cotton lace and metal eyelets Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

title: Skate Slip-On
subtitle: No lace. Built to Skate.
short_description: Updated for skateboarding, Skate Classics are built tough, grip hard and land soft.
style_description: Completely redesigned for modern skateboarding, the Skate Classics collection delivers more of what skateboarders need to enable maximum progression. Made with classic suede and canvas uppers, the Skate Slip-On gives you the iconic look you want while bringing all the performance benefits skateboarders demand. A wardrobe staple in the skateboarding community for decades, these Skate Slip-Ons were featured in Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4, cementing their place in skateboarding forever.
details: Skate high top shoe Suede and 10 oz canvas upper for a durable and classic look As seen in Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Lace-up closure for a secure and customizable fit Internal tongue straps secure the tongue, preventing it from sliding during movement A molded heel counter provides structure support, improving stability and fit PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended skating DuraCap™ is a thin rubber underlay designed specifically for skateboarding, placed in key areas to protect against griptape wear Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Vans Shoe Care Travel Kit
subtitle: Clean kicks, anywhere you go.
short_description: A compact kit with everything you need to keep your Vans looking fresh on the fly.
style_description: No matter where you wander, the Vans Shoe Care Travel Kit has your back—and your shoes. Designed to keep your favorite pairs clean and crisp, this compact set includes a travel-size foaming cleaner, refresher spray, water and stain shield, and a dual-bristle brush. Whether it’s mud, scuffs, or everyday grime, you’re always ready to step out looking sharp.
details: Includes foaming cleaner, deodorizer, stain shield, and dual-bristle brush Compact size for travel-friendly convenience Safe for canvas, suede, leather, mesh, and more Perfect for quick touch-ups or full cleans Water & Stain Shield forms an invisible barrier against moisture and stains Foaming Cleaner lifts dirt and grime from white bumpers, side walls, soles and uppers Refresher deodorizes to keep shoes smelling clean Shoe Brush provides safe, effective scrubbing on rubber and fabric surfaces

title: Invado OG Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Customized performance.
short_description: The Invado OG merges traditional lacing and the power of BOA® for customizable heel hold that stays put in all terrain.
style_description: The Invado OG combines classic Vans style with elevated heel hold. Utilizing both the Vans Hybrid BOA Fit System and traditional lacing, the Invado OG stands the test of all terrain. The dual-density, heat-moldable core of the liner shapes to your foot, creating unparalleled comfort and a uniquely perfect fit.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street terrain, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Flex rating: 4-6 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper for added visual interest V1 UltraCush™ Liner features an UltraCush™ interior layer, a dual-density heat-moldable core for customized fit, a comfort flex neoprene toe box, and a closed-seam brushed fleece cuff V1 PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot Our V1 Harness is our lightest and simplest harness, designed to ensure effective support and heel hold when paired with our V1 liner V1 Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions BOA® Fit System with Vans Hybrid Custom Slide Guide merges traditional lacing with the power of the BOA Fit System at the instep and the adjustable flex control of the Custom Slide Guide for secure, targeted heel hold and a true custom fit

title: Skate Old Skool 36+ Shoe by Atiba Jefferson
subtitle: United Through Skateboarding.
short_description: The Skate Old Skool 36+ by Atiba for Vans.
style_description: Atiba’s Skate Old Skool™ 36+ stands out with one of his most iconic photos of skate legend, John Cardiel, printed on the insole, and custom hand-drawn logos by his friend and graffiti artist, Haze. The Old Skool 36+ features a refined fit with a padded tongue for added comfort, Duracap™ technology for longevity, and Sickstick™ gum rubber for next-level grip. Additionally, a shorter toe cap and pull tabs on the tongue and heel bring it all together, giving this 90s-inspired shoe its signature style.
details: Updated classic skate low-top shoe Leather and mesh upper blends durability with comfort DuraCap™ technology is designed to add extra durability and protection where it matters most Our SickStick™ gum rubber compound and waffle sole combine for next-level grip PopCush™ insoles are designed for maximum cushioning for high-impact skateboarding Iconic Skate Imagery Insoles printed with an archival Atiba photograph of skate legend, John Cardiel Custom Artwork by Haze Logo designed by Atiba's friend and legendary graffiti artist, Haze Extra padded collar for superior support and comfort Wider entry and heel pull easy wear and modern look Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Black primary lace with metal eyelets, includes extra set of dried kelp green laces Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Classic Slip-On Checkerboard Platform Shoe
subtitle: Slip on. Stack up.
short_description: Iconic Slip-On style gets a little lift with a platform sole and double the sidewall.
style_description: The Classic Slip-On Stackform Checkerboard refreshes our original slip-on silhouette with an even chunkier take on the platform aesthetic. Constructed with an exaggerated sidewall for double the height, this platform shoe amplifies a classic favorite while bringing a new Off the Wall style to your look.
details: Iconic slip on shoe 34 mm platform height Canvas upper for a classic look Padded collar for support and comfort Elastic side panels for easy slip-on and off Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

title: Hi-Standard OG Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Bestseller for a reason.

style_description: The Hi-Standard OG is the best-selling Vans boot of all time, and continues to be the standard-bearer for classic style and modern performance. The comfort and familiar feel of traditional lace-up closure gains additional support from our lightest harness and heat-moldable core for a customized fit. With instep flex zone to maintain natural ankle flexion and a footbed that uses 3D anatomical shaping for next-level impact protection, you're ready for whatever the mountain throws your way.

title: Crosspath Shoe
subtitle: Always ready.
short_description: Mixing Vans style and all-terrain functionality, with water-repellent DWR and grippy tread.
style_description: Wherever your active lifestyle takes you, the Crosspath has you covered for all-day exploration. Expanding on the inspiration behind Vans' UltraRange family, it offers the perfect blend of style and functionality for urban and outdoor adventures. Extremely versatile and infused with comfort, this water-resistant low-top shoe pairs a lightweight, thougthful construction with maximum cushioning and enhanced traction for any terrain from the trail to the streets.
details: Water-repellant, all-terrain low-top sneaker Designed for daily wear, unexpected weather, and light outdoor activities DWR (durable water repellent) coating to shed light moisture Treaded outsole delivers reliable traction in all weather conditions Non-insulated, designed for four-season wearability UltraCush midsole cushioning for long-lasting comfort Maximum cushioning and moderate stability The Checkerboard Globe logo signifies that 30% of the product is made of one or a combination of Regenerative, Renewable, and/or Recycled materials Signature Sidestripe brings classic Vans DNA to the design Lace closure provides a secure, adjustable fit Heel-to-toe drop: 7 MM Weight: 12.50 OZ

title: Skate Half Cab Wafflecup Shoe
subtitle: Half Cab Legacy. New Tech
short_description: WaffleCup™ support, reinforced fit, and impact protection.
style_description: The Skate Half Cab WaffleCup™ stays true to the legacy of Steve Caballero’s mid-top icon—then arms it with tech to handle the modern session. With a locked-in fit, reinforced durability, and upgraded cushioning, this version is built to take more hits, hold its shape longer, and keep your feet fresher when the lines stretch on. From flatground to stair sets, it’s the evolution of a classic, designed to take whatever you throw at it.
details: Iconic signature mid-top Durable leather upper with bar-tag reinforcements Wafflecup™ combines cupsole support and durability with vulcanized board feel and flexibility SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board DuraCap rubber underlay is placed in key areas to protect against griptape wear. LUXLINER™ inner for breathable, seamless fit PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating Molded heel counter improves stability and fit Hidden stash pocket at the tongue Updated upper pattern with bar-tag reinforcements

title: Lowland 2.0 Shoe
subtitle: Nod To The Past.
short_description: Inspired by our '80s Serio Collection with a retro "Flying V" logo and modern upgrades.
style_description: The Lowland 2.0 takes everything loved about the Lowland and builds on it, delivering a fresh blend of Vans’ sport-inspired heritage and modern innovation. With an updated fit for improved comfort and a durable full rubber cupsole replacing ComfyCush tech, it’s built for lasting wear without compromising style. Perfect for those who value versatility and authenticity.
details: 80s archival-inspired silhouette Slim, low-top profile for a clean, versatile look. Leather and synthetic uppers for durability and texture Lace-up closure with bloucher construction for a secure, customizable fit Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Rubber heel detail adds durability and stability Cupsole construction provides enhanced support and durable Hybrid waffle sole with pivot zones and flex notches for optimal grip and movement Heritage “Flying V” logo

title: Authentic Wide Shoe
subtitle: The original since ‘66.
short_description: The longest running style in the Vans lineup, the Authentic is where it all started.
style_description: The Authentic is the original Vans silhouette. First introduced in 1966 and driven forward by creative culture ever since, this time-honored shoe keeps the old school vibe alive with sturdy canvas uppers in seasonal colorways. With its classic low-top design and iconic rubber waffle outsole, the Authentic Wide is a blank canvas for creativity that allows you to do your thing in your own unique way. Wide width sizes provide a spacious platform by a bottom width that is 5mm wider and a ball girth that is 10mm longer than our regular width sizes.
details: Low-top shoe Wide construction Canvas upper for a durable and classic look Unpadded, low-profile cuff for a minimalist fit Metal eyelets. Four on sizes 3.5 - 6 and five on sizes 6.5+ Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Super Lowpro Collapse Shoe
subtitle: Slip in, step out.
short_description: Retro style that adapts with a collapsible heel and stretch collar.
style_description: The Super Lowpro Collapse brings retro track-inspired design to a flexible, packable silhouette. A deconstructed heel counter softens structure for added give and adaptive fit, while the stretch collar allows for quick entry. A low-profile EVA midsole keeps it lightweight underfoot, finished with heritage sport details true to Vans DNA.
details: Low-profile, vintage track-inspired sneakers Inspired by ’80s Serio Style 84 Heel counter collapses for easy slip-on wear/packable Stretch collar provides a comfortable, adaptive fit EVA midsole and wedge for lightweight cushioning and durability OrthoLite® foam insole for cushioning Leather and nylon upper for durability and classic look Heritage “Serio” branding on the tongue Rubber outsole with Vans’ signature waffle pattern for superior grip Lace closure for an adjustable fit Padded tongue adds comfort and support

title: Premium Classic Slip-On Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: No laces. Premium build.
short_description: Skateboarding’s original Slip-On, upgraded with enhanced cushioning for extra comfort.
style_description: Born from Southern California skate culture, the Classic Slip-On is the global icon of laid-back style. Now elevated with a higher sidewall, midweight canvas, a Sola Foam ADC insole, and enhanced cushioning and an upgraded footbed, this premium take on the classic delivers all-day comfort.
details: Signature Slip-On shoe 8 oz canvas upper for a light but durable finish Padded collar for support and comfort Elastic side panels for easy slip-on and off Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Checkerboard pattern on vamp and heel

subtitle: Customized performance.
short_description: The Invado OG merges traditional lacing and the power of BOA® for customizable heel hold that stays put in all terrain.
style_description: The Invado OG combines classic Vans style with elevated heel hold. Utilizing both the Vans Hybrid BOA Fit System and traditional lacing, the Invado OG stands the test of all terrain. The dual-density, heat-moldable core of the liner shapes to your foot, creating unparalleled comfort and a uniquely perfect fit.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street terrain, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Flex rating: 4-6 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper for added visual interest V1 UltraCush™ Liner features an UltraCush™ interior layer, a dual-density heat-moldable core for customized fit, a comfort flex neoprene toe box, and a closed-seam brushed fleece cuff V1 PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable Our V1 Harness is our lightest and simplest harness, designed to ensure effective support and heel hold when paired with our V1 liner Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V1 Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: Infuse Gum Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Powerful Performance.
short_description: Decked in performance-focused features, the Infuse brings unchecked progression to any terrain.
style_description: The Infuse is about performance, plain and simple. As one of our most popular all-terrain, all-condition boots, it's loaded with top-shelf features like the Vans Flex Control System for control, Powercuff Strap for stability, a V3 Popcush Footbed for anatomical foot support, and a Hybrid Plus BOA Custom Fit System for quick adjustments anywhere you go. This boot has everything you want in a snowboard boot. The question is: what are you gonna do with it?
details: Designed for backcountry, all-mountain, and park/street, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to steep, deep terrain Flex rating: 5-9 Skill level: intermediate, advanced Leather and synthetic upper for style and strength Waterproof Zipper Shroud + D Ring is a durable, weatherproof fabric shield blocks moisture out of your boot. It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow. Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Exocap Molded Toe Protection provides maximum protection and extra space in the toe box to keep your toes warm Enhanced with The North Face FlashDry materialization, a neoprene forefoot, an updated X-cage for superior heel hold, and a soft microsuede cuff and tongue Our V3 Harness offers our most advanced support to the ankle and instep, keeping the liner and boot shell locked in Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V3 PopCush™ Footbed features a 3D molded anatomical shape, TPU arch support heel clip, an OrthoLite® top layer, and airflow perforations for breathability Inspired by moto endurance racing with a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, and a TPU toe pick for added traction and snow tread BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: La Costa Checkerboard Slide-On Sandal
subtitle: Comfort and convenience.
short_description: Meet the slide you'll never want to take off.
style_description: Inspired by Vans vulcanized roots, the La Costa Slide-On Checkerboard takes all of the iconic DNA from our Classics and wraps it up in a slide you'll never want to take off. From the tonal checkerboard print on the straps to the iconic red heel scab, this sandal has an unmistakable Vans aesthetic. Add in a lightweight UltraCush Lite waffle outsole for comfort, and you've got a slide sandal that transcends summer.
details: Slide sandal inspired by our vulcanized roots Synthetic nubuck straps with iconic checkerboard print Soft rubber and stretch textile linings Lightweight, flexible, and durable injected UltraCush Lite waffle outsoles Subtle waffle pattern on the footbed Made with water-based inks and glues

title: Knu Skool Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: In With The Knu.
short_description: Oversized laces and puffed-up ’90s attitude on Vans’ signature sole.
style_description: Born in ’98, the Knu Skool took inspiration from the iconic Old Skool to create something entirely its own. Oversized laces, a puffed tongue, and a plush collar captured unapologetic ’90s style, all grounded on Vans’ signature vulcanized sole.
details: Reissued '90s-inspired low-top shoe Suede upper for a soft, textured finish Oversized tongue and padded collar for extra comfort Wide laces for bold style and adjustable, secure fit Heel pulls for ease of entry Puffy 3D Sidestripe™ blends throwback style with a modern edge Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Checkerboard branding is unmistakably Vans

title: Skate Old Skool 36+ Shoe
subtitle: Feel Something New.
short_description: The same iconic style, upgraded with refined materials and modern construction.
style_description: The Premium Old Skool redefines an iconic silhouette with elevated comfort, a seamless fit, and refined details that honor its heritage. A padded collar offers support, and the upgraded footbed offers elevated cushioning. Designed with care and crafted for all-day wear, it delivers style rooted in legacy while embracing modern innovation for a look and feel like no other.
details: Skate-inspired, low-top shoe Canvas and suede upper layers two textures Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Soft padded collar for enhanced comfort Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original '90s Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Iconic leather Sidestripe™ insignia The Checkerboard Globe logo signifies that 30% of the product is made of one or a combination of regenerative, renewable, and/or recycled materials

title: Aura Pro Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Comfort out of bounds.
short_description: A dual-zone BOA® Fit System and anatomical footbed work together to ensure a customized fit that stays close, in or out of bounds.
style_description: Featuring comfort, control, and style that only Vans can offer, the Aura Pro delivers on its versatile, hardworking reputation as the boot built to perform in all conditions. A dual-zone BOA® Fit System featuring Vans Custom Focus provides unlimited on-the-fly micro-adjustability backed by the customizable comfort and heel hold of the Custom Slide Guide. Add in a thermoregulating liner and high traction outsole for the sidecountry, and the Aura Pro exceeds expectations for comfort and performance.
details: Backcountry and all-mountain boot Flex rating: 5-6 Skill Level: intermediate to advanced V2 UltraCush™ with Smartwool Liner uses odor-resistant, thermoregulating Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush™ cushioning layer for a liner that is warm but breathable, with a Comfort Flex neoprene toe box and X-Cage for superior heel hold V2 PopCush™ Footbed utilizes dual-density PopCush™ construction, a 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, and a TPU arch support heel clip for stability while allowing for torsional flex PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings Our V2 Harness allows for customizable heel hold, working in tandem with the V2 liner for enhanced support and a personalized fit Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V2 Waffle Pro Outsole with All-Trac Cold Weather Rubber Compound provides natural flex and a weight-reducing, impact-resisting UltraCush midsole provide sensitive boardfeel, while a Vans-exclusive lug tread pattern gives you the traction you need to explore the sidecountry with confidence BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: Skate Half Cab Wafflecup by Atiba Jefferson
subtitle: United Through Skateboarding.
short_description: The Skate Half Cab WaffleCup by Atiba for Vans.
style_description: Atiba helps us introduce the first-ever Half Cab to feature a WaffleCup outsole, bringing his personal touch to the design with one of his most iconic photos of skate legend John Cardiel printed on the insole and custom hand-drawn logos by Atiba's friend and graffiti artist Haze. Durable suede and canvas uppers with breathable mesh ensure durability, while SickStick™ rubber sole grips hard and resists griptape wear. PopCush™ footbeds cushion impacts, and Wafflecup™ construction offers sturdy support with flexible boardfeel.
details: Iconic signature mid-top Monochromatic oatmeal beige Durable leather upper with bar-tag reinforcements SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board DuraCap™ rubber underlay adds extra durability and protection where it matters most Mesh panels for added breathability and softer foam around the ankles PopCush™ insoles provide maximum cushioning for high-impact skateboarding Insoles printed with an archival Atiba photograph of skate legend John Cardiel Custom logo artwork by Atiba's friend and legendary graffiti artist Haze Molded heel counter improves stability and fit Hidden stash pocket at the tongue Wafflecup™ outsole blends cupsole support with vulcanized boardfeel Oatmeal beige primary lace, includes second set of white laces

title: AVE 2.0 Shoe
subtitle: Pushing Boundaries.
short_description: Our most technically-advanced skate shoe ever.
style_description: Anthony Van Engelen is always pushing the boundaries of skateboarding. Together, Vans and AVE have consistently delivered our most progressive skate shoes, and his latest pro model is our most uncompromised yet. Featuring Vans’ revolutionary UltimateWaffle sole, the AVE 2.0 pulls from decades of footwear innovation to set a new standard by combining added grip and cushioning with unrivaled support and durability, enabling skaters to keep pushing the boundaries—just like AVE.
details: Skate low top shoe Tailored specifically for skateboarding Suede and knit uppers blend durability with comfort Padded collar and mesh liner deliver enhanced support and comfort Breathable sides, heel, and tongue keep feet cool during intense skate sessions RAPIDWELD™ construction fuses materials seamlessly for a lightweight, rip-resistant build DURACAP™ reinforces key areas to handle heavy wear and protect against grip tape abrasion Lace-up closure for a secure and customizable fit UltraCush™ midsole cushions impact with every step Clear TPU midfoot adds support and modern style UltimateWaffle™ sole ensures superior grip, flex, and stability TPU heel clip adds support and locks in a secure fit SickStick™ rubber compound provides maximum grip on your board

title: Premium Authentic Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: Classic style. Premium build.
short_description: Our original silhouette, upgraded with enhanced cushioning and an improved fit.
style_description: Born in 1966, the Authentic set the standard for clean, functional design. This premium build stays true to its roots while stepping things up with a checkerboard canvas upper, a refined fit, and a cushioned insole for lasting comfort and a softer step. It’s a new level of wearability for a timeless original.
details: Heritage low top shoes 8 oz canvas upper for a light but durable finish Cotton lace and metal eyelets Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 The Checkerboard Globe logo signifies that 30% of the product is made of one or a combination of Regenerative, Renewable, and/or Recycled materials

title: Sk8-Hi Wide Shoe
subtitle: The original skate hi-top
short_description: Established in 1978, the Sk8-Hi is classic on any stage.
style_description: The Sk8-Hi was a game changer as the first high-top skate shoe to break onto the scene. With a padded collar for ankle support and reinforced toe caps, it was, and still is, an emblem of Off The Wall culture. The Sk8-Hi was our second model to showcase the Vans Sidestripe, and its bold design has remained iconic ever since. With the Sk8-Hi Wide Canvas, this innovative high-top allows even more room to do your thing. Wide width sizes provide a spacious platform by a bottom width that is 5mm wider and a ball girth that is 10mm longer than our regular width sizes.
details: Legendary high top, Sidestripe shoe Wide construction Durable suede and canvas uppers Lace-up closure Reinforced toe caps Supportive padded collars Signature rubber waffle outsoles Classic Sk8-Hi

title: Skate Curren Caples Shoe
subtitle: Vulcanized Perfection.
short_description: Durable. Functional. Straightforward. Everything Curren wants and needs in a skate shoe.
style_description: In his never-ending search for Vulcanized Perfection, Curren Caples brings his first signature Skate shoe to the mix. Featuring a new custom outsole pattern optimized for grip and board feel with SickStick™ rubber. Plus, a Popcush™ insole for maximum cushioning and Duracap™ underlays for extra protection where it matters most.
details: Designed By Curren Caples Signature skate low-top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather upper for a smooth, durable finish PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating DuraCap™ underlays add extra durability and protection where it matters most SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Padded collar for support and comfort Custom SideStripe™ tread-pattern outsole for on-board grip and durability Vans X Curren Caples print on tongue Vans Skateboarding logo heel scab Vans Checkerboard hangflag Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Lace closure for an adjustable fit

title: Upland Shoe
subtitle: Inspired by then, made for now.
short_description: Straight from 2000. With a puffy upper, chunky laces and comfort-focused upgrades.
style_description: Meet the Upland, a sneaker of the past reengineered for the future. We've taken the chunky 90s low-top classic and added some modern touches. The redesigned foot shape brings improved fit and comfort, while elevated materials blend durability and style. With oversized laces and bold logo hits, the Upland seamlessly bridges our heritage with whatever today has in store.
details: Chunky 90s low-top sneakers Archive-inspired, builds on the legacy of the original Upland silhouette Stitched-on cupsole wraps the whole shoe for insane durability Upper combines leather and polyethylene for style and strength New and improved foot shape for enhanced comfort Puffy collar and padded tongue bring that extra support Heritage Flying V logo nods to the Uplands heritage Wide laces add to the classic vibe

title: Premium Old Skool Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: Feel Something New.
short_description: The same iconic style, upgraded with lightweight canvas, suede, and modernized construction.
style_description: The Warped Tour Capsule pops with always-on checkerboard, two-tone designs, and flame prints, paying homage to the early 2000s. Our updated Premium build keeps the iconic Old Skool silhouette intact, refined for today with better cushioning and an improved fit. suede and lightweight canvas meet the ’90s-inspired design, all crafted with sustainable materials for a fresh take on a classic.
details: Skate-inspired, low-top shoe Music Collection, Warped Tour Capsule Canvas and suede upper layers two textures Leather collar lining and padded collar for support and comfort Higher sidewall with glossy finish 100% cotton laces, woven flag label Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, 30% bio-based material Regenerative rubber outsoles for more sustainability Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Red logo heel scab Checkerboard print

title: Invado Pro Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Pro. Park. Performance.
short_description: With an arsenal of features boosting its fit and versatility, the Invado Pro brings pro-level performance to every trick you try.
style_description: The Invado Pro is one of the most versatile snowboard boots available. Combining the unlimited customization of Vans Hybrid BOA Fit System with the unmatched heel hold of the Custom Slide Guide and the comfort and warmth of the V2 UltraCush Smartwool liner, the Invado Pro delivers pro-level performance in any situation. Add in the terrain management of a V2 Waffle Pro outsole and the heat-moldable core of the liner and you have unparalleled comfort and a perfect fit.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street terrain, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Textile and synthetic upper Flex rating: 5-7 Skill level: intermediate, advanced V2 UltraCush™ with Smartwool Liner uses odor-resistant, thermoregulating Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush™ cushioning layer for a liner that is warm but breathable, with a Comfort Flex neoprene toe box and X-Cage for superior heel hold V2 PopCush™ Footbed utilizes dual-density PopCush™ construction, a 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, and a TPU arch support heel clip for stability while allowing for torsional flex Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V2 Waffle Pro Outsole with All-Trac Cold Weather Rubber Compound provides natural flex and a weight-reducing, impact-resisting UltraCush midsole provide sensitive boardfeel, while a Vans-exclusive lug tread pattern gives you the traction you need to explore the sidecountry with confidence BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: Skate Curren Caples Gum Shoe
subtitle: Vulcanized Perfection.
short_description: Durable. Functional. Straightforward. Everything Curren wants and needs in a skate shoe.
style_description: In his never-ending search for Vulcanized Perfection, Curren Caples brings his first signature Skate shoe to the mix. Featuring a new custom outsole pattern optimized for grip and board feel with SickStick™ rubber. Plus, a Popcush™ insole for maximum cushioning and Duracap™ underlays for extra protection where it matters most.
details: Designed By Curren Caples Signature skate low-top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather upper for a smooth, durable finish PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating DuraCap™ underlays add extra durability and protection where it matters most SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Padded collar for support and comfort Custom SideStripe™ tread-pattern outsole for on-board grip and durability Vans X Curren Caples print on tongue Vans Skateboarding logo heel scab Vans Checkerboard hangflag Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Lace closure for an adjustable fit

title: Infuse Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Powerful Performance.
short_description: Decked in performance-focused features, the Infuse brings unchecked progression to any terrain.
style_description: The Infuse is about performance, plain and simple. As one of our most popular all-terrain, all-condition boots, it's loaded with top-shelf features like the Vans Flex Control System for control, Powercuff Strap for stability, a V3 Popcush Footbed for anatomical foot support, and a Hybrid Plus BOA Custom Fit System for quick adjustments anywhere you go. This boot has everything you want in a snowboard boot. The question is: what are you gonna do with it?
details: Designed for backcountry, all-mountain, and park/street, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to steep, deep terrain Flex rating: 5-9 Skill level: intermediate, advanced Leather and synthetic upper for style and strength Waterproof Zipper Shroud + D Ring is a durable, weatherproof fabric shield blocks moisture out of your boot. It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow. Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Exocap Molded Toe Protection provides maximum protection and extra space in the toe box to keep your toes warm Enhanced with The North Face FlashDry materialization, a neoprene forefoot, an updated X-cage for superior heel hold, and a soft microsuede cuff and tongue Our V3 Harness offers our most advanced support to the ankle and instep, keeping the liner and boot shell locked in Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V3 PopCush™ Footbed features a 3D molded anatomical shape, TPU arch support heel clip, an OrthoLite® top layer, and airflow perforations for breathability Inspired by moto endurance racing with a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, and a TPU toe pick for added traction and snow tread BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: La Costa Checkerboard Lite Sandal
subtitle: Comfort and convenience.
short_description: Blending effortless style with all-day comfort.
style_description: Inspired by Vans vulcanized roots, the La Costa Lite takes all of the iconic DNA from our Classics and wraps it up in a pair of ultra-comfy flip flops. From the signature hang flag to the heritage foxing line on the sidewall, this sandal has an unmistakable Vans aesthetic. Add in a lightweight UltraCush Lite waffle outsole for comfort, and you've got a warm-weather staple like no other.
details: Sandal inspired by our vulcanized roots Synthetic nubuck straps Soft rubber and stretch textile linings Lightweight, flexible, and durable injected UltraCush Lite waffle outsoles Subtle waffle pattern on the footbed Made with water-based inks and glues

title: Verse Snowboard Boot
subtitle: A class of its own.
short_description: As one of the most technical terrain boots available, this Verse brings advancements in performance and protection.
style_description: The Verse has long been regarded as one of the most versatile and technical terrain boots available. This next iteration brings generational advancements in both performance and protection. With a BOA® Fit System, the Verse is optimized for precision and power. Complemented with arch support and an outsole inspired by moto endurance racing for added traction, it’s also well outfitted for backcountry missions and more capable on and off piste than ever before. Top to bottom, the newly redesigned Verse is engineered to be in a class of its own.
details: All-mountain boot that excels in the backcountry, optimized for versatility from dropping into big lines in the resort to riding steep, deep terrain out of bounds Flex rating: 6-9 Skill level: advanced V3 UltraCush™ The North Face FlashDry™ liner is enhanced with The North Face FlashDry materialization, a neoprene forefoot, an updated X-cage for superior heel hold, and a soft microsuede cuff and tongue V3 PopCush™ Footbed features a 3D molded anatomical shape, TPU arch support heel clip, an OrthoLite® top layer, and airflow perforations for breathability Waterproof Zipper Shroud + D Ring is a durable, weatherproof fabric shield blocks moisture out of your boot. It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow Exocap Molded Toe Protection provides maximum protection and extra space in the toe box to keep your toes warm Vans Flex Control System uses high-rebound Hytrel tongue stiffeners for boot flex adjustability. As your boots soften up over time, add the tongue stiffeners back in to extend the life of your boots. Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet Asymmetrical Flex Zone allows your knees to flex in a more natural way with larger flex zones on the inside of the foot for precise control while carving Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot. V3 Superenduro Waffle Outsole is inspired by moto endurance racing with a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, and a TPU toe pick for added traction and snow tread BOA® Fit System with Vans Hybrid Custom Slide Guide merges traditional lacing with the power of the BOA Fit System at the instep and the adjustable flex control of the Custom Slide Guide for secure, targeted heel hold and a true custom fit

title: Women's Encore OG Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Custom fit made easy.
short_description: A lightweight and responsive boot designed with speed and simplicity in mind.
style_description: The Encore OG streamlines comfort and fit through its single-dial BOA® Fit System for precise, on-the-fly adjustability anywhere you go. With a PopCush™ Footbed for advanced impact protection and a Waffle Lug Outsole for traction in all conditions, the Encore OG is built for every trail, feature, and hit you can find at the resort. With a V1 Waffle Lug outsole and classic Sidestripe™ for unmistakable Vans style, you'll look good doing it, too.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Flex rating: 4-5 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper V1 UltraCush™ Liner features an UltraCush™ interior layer, a dual-density heat-moldable core for customized fit, a comfort flex neoprene toe box, and a closed-seam brushed fleece cuff PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable Our V1 Harness is our lightest and simplest harness, designed to ensure effective support and heel hold when paired with our V1 liner Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions BOA® Fit System provides a precision fit with on-the-fly micro-adjustability

title: Premium Authentic Harris Tweed® Shoe
subtitle: The Harris Tweed® Authentic
short_description: Crafted with multi-tonal wool uppers–handwoven, dyed, spun, and finished at the oldest operating Harris Tweed mill on the Isle of Lewis.
style_description: Harris Tweed wool uppers bring rich, multi-tonal depth to this Premium Authentic. Crafted by hand on treadle-powered looms and finished at the oldest operating mill on the Isle of Lewis, each pair is certified with the Harris Tweed Orb mark, a symbol of traceable craftsmanship since 1909. Finished with a cushioned footbed for all-day comfort, it’s a heritage design built for everyday wear.
details: Heritage low top shoes Harris Tweed upper uses 100% virgin wool dyed, blended, carded, spun, warped, woven, and finished in the Scottish Outer Hebrides by local artisans Each pair is certified with the Harris Tweed Orb mark, a symbol of traceable craftmanship and enduring qualify since 1909 Cotton lace and metal eyelets Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

title: Half Cab Decon Shoe
subtitle: Lighter. Sleeker. Still cut from skate.
short_description: Reimagined signature heritage in a sleeker silhouette for more versatility.
style_description: The Half Cab Decon reimagines a skate legend with a deconstructed build that's lighter and lower profile. Born from Caballero's iconic mid-top design, this slimmed-down version keeps the Half Cab's skate DNA while providing a more versatile fit for all-day wear.
details: Low-profile mid-top shoe Canvas and suede upper layers two textures Deconstructed paneling for a lighter feel and slimmer overall fit Lace closure with metal eyelets Steve Caballero labels Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Hi-Standard Pro Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Hi-Standard, pro-level.
short_description: Pro-level V2 Components and a look that drips progressive heritage, this boot holds strong no matter the landing.
style_description: As the Pro-level cousin in the Hi-Standard family, the Hi-Standard Pro has a lot to live up to. An odor-resistant liner and V2 Waffle Pro Outsole give you the grip and thermoregulation to bootpack to your heart's content, while a 3D-molded anatomical footbed and TPU arch support heel clip ensure you have the stability and flex to give every line your all.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street, from parks and powder to urban environments and everything in between Flex rating: 5-6 Skill level: intermediate, advanced Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported V2 UltraCush™ with Smartwool Liner uses odor-resistant, thermoregulating Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush™ cushioning layer for a liner that is warm but breathable, with a Comfort Flex neoprene toe box and X-Cage for superior heel hold V2 Harness allows for customizable heel hold, working in tandem with the V2 liner for enhanced support and a personalized fit Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V2 PopCush™ Footbed utilizes dual-density PopCush™ construction, a 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, and a TPU arch support heel clip for stability while allowing for torsional flex V2 Waffle Pro Outsole with All-Trac Cold Weather Rubber Compound provides natural flex and a weight-reducing, impact-resisting UltraCush midsole provide sensitive boardfeel, while a Vans-exclusive lug tread pattern gives you the traction you need to explore the sidecountry with confidence

title: Skate Old Skool 36+ Gum Shoe
subtitle: Past meets present.
short_description: Bringing modern upgrades to an iconic design.
style_description: Inspired by the original Old Skool—first released in 1977—the Skate Old Skool 36+ is a brand-new skate shoe that takes style cues from the mid-’90s, combining a padded tongue and shorter toe cap with modern upgrades. Complete with the our grippy SickStick™ rubber and long-lasting DuraCap™ rubber underlays, the Skate Old Skool 36+ brings modern performance and durability to a heritage-inspired silhouette.
details: Updated classic skate low-top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather and mesh upper blends durability with comfort A padded tongue and collar provide a modern, ‘90s-inspired style with extra comfort and support DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Popcush™ insoles are designed for maximum cushioning without sacrificing boardfeel Extra padded collar for superior support and comfort Wider tongue adds extra comfort and coverage Tongue pull for easy entry and adjustability Wider entry and heel pull easy wear and modern look Metal eyelets for improved function and refinement Single wrap foxing for a sleek, taller sidewall Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit

title: Crosspath Mid Shoe
subtitle: Always ready.
short_description: Mixing Vans style and all-terrain functionality, with water-repellent DWR and grippy tread.
style_description: The Crosspath Mid Shoe is designed to tackle both city streets and unpaved terrain. Elevated for added ankle support, it's built for any adventure with everyday comfort, reliable grip, and water-repellent uppers to keep you moving.
details: Water-repellant, all-terrain mid-top sneaker Designed for daily wear, unexpected weather, and light outdoor activities DWR (durable water repellent) coating to shed light moisture Treaded outsole delivers reliable traction Non-insulated, designed for four-season wearability UltraCush™ midsole cushioning for long-lasting comfort Maximum cushioning and moderate stability The Checkerboard Globe logo signifies that 30% of the product is made of one or a combination of Regenerative, Renewable, and/or Recycled materials Signature Sidestripe brings classic Vans DNA to the design Lace closure provides a secure, adjustable fit Offset (heel-to-toe drop): 7 mm Weight: 22.4 oz

subtitle: Bestseller for a reason.
short_description: Classic style with features dedicated to support, comfort, and modern performance.

Optimized for versatility from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease, the comfort and familiar feel of a traditional lace-up closure gets a support boost from our Instep Lace Lockout and Internal Web Harness. Bring in the precise boardfeel and traction of the waffle outsole and the comfortable calf support from the PleasureCuff and you have a timeless boot made to go places.

subtitle: Comfort and convenience.
