Add in a lightweight UltraCush Lite waffle outsole for comfort, and you've got a slide sandal with an unmistakable Vans aesthetic that transcends summer.
details: Slide sandal inspired by our vulcanized roots Synthetic nubuck straps with Vans logo Soft rubber and stretch textile linings Lightweight, flexible, and durable injected UltraCush Lite waffle outsoles Subtle waffle pattern on the footbed

title: Premium Half Cab 33 GORE-TEX Shoe
subtitle: Half Cab, weatherized.
short_description: Premium take on our legendary skate shoe, with GORE-TEX for waterproofing, windproofing, and breathability.
style_description: Originally released in 1988, the Half Cab set the standard for skate performance. This elevated version respects that legacy while pushing things forward with GORE-TEX weatherproofing made to withstand tough conditions, while a Sola Foam ADC insole and upgraded footbed bring soft, everyday comfort.
details: Signature mid top shoe Leather and canvas upper with GORE-TEX® waterproof Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Padded collar for support and comfort Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

title: Classic Slip-On Platform Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: Slip on. Stack up.
short_description: Iconic Slip-On style gets a little lift with a platform sole and double the sidewall.
style_description: The Classic Slip-On Platform pushes our iconic slip-on shoe to new heights. Featuring higher sidewalls and our signature checkerboard print, this slip-on platform shoe elevates a cult favorite while staying true to the original style.
details: Iconic slip-on shoe Updated platform sidewalls Sturdy canvas uppers with checkerboard print Elastic side accents Supportive padded collars Signature rubber waffle outsoles

title: Vans Bold and Bloom Shoe Charm Set
subtitle: Natural Edge.
short_description: Shiny monotone details add pops of rock 'n' roll with every step.
style_description: Silver shoe charms embellish every outfit from the ground up. Personalize any outfit with chains, metal roses, and lightning bolts that infuse your shoes with edge.
details: Shoe charm and chain set 4 shoe charms with silver round clips and hardware 1 double curb chain with one large link chain and one small link chain Includes: rose charm, star charm, lightning bolt charm, bike charm and chain Contains small parts. Not intended for children under 12 years old

title: Skate Rowley Gum Shoe
subtitle: From '99 to now.
short_description: The Rowley gets reborn with modern skate upgrades.
style_description: Celebrating the 25-year legacy of Geoff Rowley's original signature skate shoe, the Skate Rowley echoes skateboarding's rich history while propelling the culture forward. Redesigned for modern skateboarding, this vulcanized shoe honors the legend who etched his mark on the next generation while delivering more of what today's skaters need to push style and progression forward.
details: Low-top skate shoe Inspired by the original 1999 Rowley skate shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather and mesh upper blends durability with comfort DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Internal tongue straps prevents it from sliding during movement A molded heel counter provides structure support, improving stability and fit Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia "66/99'' honors Vans' 1966 founding and the Rowley shoe's 1999 debut Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit

title: OTW Half Cab Foam
subtitle: Cab DNA. Foam-fueled.
short_description: Mid-top Half Cab with quilted leather, clean midsole, and enhanced durability.
style_description: The OTW Half Cab Foam updates a skate icon with premium texture and all-day wearability. Originally introduced as Style 33, this version pairs smooth leather uppers with foam-filled quilting for added structure and comfort. A clean midsole sharpens the silhouette, while DURACAP™ underlays and SickStick™ rubber keep it skate ready. It’s the pinnacle of skate design—toned down, tuned up.
details: Signature mid-top shoe originally known as Style 33 Clean midsole Leather upper for a smooth, durable finish Foam and quilting in upper OTW warm grey logo heel scab Tonal upper details DURACAP™ underlays add reinforcement to high-wear areas Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability SickStick™ rubber waffle outsole provides maximum grip and traction on your board Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility

title: Vans X Odyssey BMX Proof Wafflecup Shoe
subtitle: Introducing the BMX Proof WaffleCup™
short_description: Celebrating 40 years of Odyssey with an all-new BMX design.
style_description: We teamed up with Odyssey to launch the all-new BMX Proof WaffleCup. This performance-focused shoe is designed specifically for BMX and commemorates 40 years of Odyssey, featuring their signature details and colorway. The WaffleCup™ sole combines the best of cupsole support and vulcanized pedalfeel, while PopCush™ insoles provide maximum protection for high-impact riding. It’s everything you need in a BMX shoe, complete with the new VDFPR rubber compound for unmatched grip and durability.
details: From top to bottom, the Proof is a brand-new design built for BMX Suede and canvas upper layers two textures Limited edition colorway featuring co-branding and logos celebrates 40 years of Odyssey Our new VDFPR rubber compound is formulated for balanced pedalfeel and unmatched grip Reinforced construction with DURACAP™ underlays for a longer-lasting BMX shoe WaffleCup™ BMX outsole blends cupsole support with vulcanized pedalfeel Custom printed PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Custom packaging

title: Sk8-Hi Tapered Platform Shoe
subtitle: Tapered and tall.
short_description: Elevated Sk8-Hi with a deconstructed upper, platform front and double the sidewall.
style_description: The Sk8-Hi Tapered Stackform refreshes our slimmed down high-top with an even chunkier take on the platform aesthetic. Constructed with an exaggerated sidewall for double the height, this classic platform shoe elevates a legendary favorite while bringing a new Off the Wall style to your look.
details: Legendary high top, Sidestripe shoe Slender silhouette 34 mm platform height Deconstructed suede and canvas uppers Lace-up closure Signature rubber waffle outsoles

title: Verse Range Edition Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Built for the backcountry.
short_description: High support, custom fit, and advanced features to get you up--and down--effortlessly.
style_description: The most essential part of your backcountry toolkit. As the upgraded version of the Verse designed for overland missions, the Verse Range Edition features stiff flex, an extended range of motion, a Waterproof Zipper Shroud and D-Ring to lock out snow, and waterproof, breathable valves to keep your socks dry during even the steepest of bootpacks. So capable you'll almost look forward to the incline.
details: Designed as an all-mountain boot that excels in the backcountry, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from dropping into big lines in the resort to riding steep, deep terrain out of bounds Flex rating: 6-9 Skill level: advanced V3 UltraCush™ The North Face FlashDry™ liner is enhanced with The North Face FlashDry materialization, a neoprene forefoot, an updated X-cage for superior heel hold, and a soft microsuede cuff and tongue V3 PopCush™ Footbed features a 3D molded anatomical shape, TPU arch support heel clip, an OrthoLite® top layer, and airflow perforations for breathability Adaptive Range Mode widens the opening of your boot for extended range of motion for overland adventures or "parking lot mode." Disengaging the Ride Mode strap opens the Rear Drop-Cuff and two-way stretch gore, providing significantly more calf articulation for longer strides and less wasted energy. Waterproof Zipper Shroud + D Ring is a durable, weatherproof fabric shield blocks moisture out of your boot. It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow Exocap Molded Toe Protection provides maximum protection and extra space in the toe box to keep your toes warm Vans Flex Control System uses high-rebound Hytrel tongue stiffeners for boot flex adjustability. As your boots soften up over time, add the tongue stiffeners back in to extend the life of your boots. Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response V3 Superenduro Waffle Outsole is inspired by moto endurance racing with a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, and a TPU toe pick for added traction and snow tread BOA® Fit System with Vans Hybrid Custom Slide Guide merges traditional lacing with the power of the BOA Fit System at the instep and the adjustable flex control of the Custom Slide Guide for secure, targeted heel hold and a true custom fit

title: Old Skool Gum Shoe
subtitle: Est. '77 Feel Something New.
short_description: The birth of our iconic SideStripe™, there’s always something new with the Old Skool.
style_description: The Old Skool was our first footwear design to showcase the famous Vans Sidestripe, although back then, it was just a random doodle drawn by founder Paul Van Doren. Since its debut in 1977, this low-top silhouette has established itself as an icon in the skate, music, and fashion scenes. From 90s street skaters and punks to current hip hop and fashion legends, the Old Skool has consistently been the go-to shoe for creatives who do things their own way.
details: Iconic low-top, Sidestripe shoe Durable suede and canvas uppers Padded collar for support and comfort Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Checkerboard branding is unmistakably Vans Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

title: Skate Old Skool 36+ by Atiba Jefferson
subtitle: United Through Skateboarding.
short_description: The Skate Old Skool 36+ by Atiba for Vans.
style_description: Atiba's Skate Old Skool 36+ stands out with one of his most iconic photos of skate legend John Cardiel printed on the insole and custom hand-drawn logos by his friend and graffiti artist Haze. With a refined fit with a padded tongue for added comfort, Duracap™ technology for longevity, and Sickstick™ gum rubber for next-level grip. Additionally, a shorter toe cap and pull tabs on the tongue and heel bring it all together, giving this 90s-inspired shoe its signature style.
details: Updated classic skate low-top shoe Monochromatic Atiba Solar Orange Leather and mesh upper blends durability with comfort DuraCap™ technology is designed to add extra durability and protection where it matters most SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board PopCush™ insoles are designed for maximum cushioning for high-impact skateboarding Iconic Skate Imagery Insoles printed with an archival Atiba photograph of skate legend John Cardiel Custom Artwork by Haze Logo designed by Atiba's friend and legendary graffiti artist Haze Extra padded collar for superior support and comfort Wider entry and heel pull easy wear and modern look Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Solar Orange primary lace, includes extra set of white laces Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Women's Hi-Standard Pro Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Bestseller for a reason.
short_description: Classic style with features dedicated to support, comfort, and modern performance.
style_description: The Hi-Standard OG is the standard for style and modern performance. The comfort and familiar feel of a traditional lace-up closure gets a support boost from our Instep Lace Lockout and Internal Web Harness. Bring in the precise boardfeel and traction of the V1 Waffle Lug outsole and the comfortable calf support from the PleasureCuff and you have a timeless boot made to go places.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street Flex rating: 4-5 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper for added visual interest V1 UltraCush™ Liner features an UltraCush™ interior layer, a dual-density heat-moldable core for customized fit, a comfort flex neoprene toe box, and a closed-seam brushed fleece cuff Our V1 Harness is our lightest and simplest harness, designed to ensure effective support and heel hold when paired with our V1 liner Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported V1 PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V1 Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions

title: BMX Old Skool Gum Shoe
subtitle: BMX icon.
short_description: Blending a legendary style with bike-ready grip and durability.
style_description: Designed for modern riding, the BMX Old Skool features Wafflecup™ technology for maximum pedal feel, Duracap™ underlays for enhanced longevity, and a padded collar for added cushioning. This vulcanized low-top silhouette offers unrivaled BMX innovation to support nonstop progression.
details: Flat pedal BMX/MTB low-top shoe Designed for riding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede upper for a soft, textured finish DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating VDFPR (Van Doren Factory Pedal Recipe) rubber sole delivers enhanced pedal grip and durability Padded collar for support and comfort Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Wafflecup™ combines cupsole support and durability with vulcanized pedal feel and flexibility Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit

title: Skate Chukka Low Shoe
subtitle: Inspired by the Classics.
short_description: Timeless and versatile style, made for everyday wear.
style_description: The Skate Chukka Low, designed by the Vans skate team and inspired by classics like the Authentic and the Chukka Boot, blends classic suede and canvas uppers with the best in boardfeel, flex, and traction.
details: Skate low top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede and 6 oz canvas upper is durable and low profile Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Lace-up closure for a secure and customizable fit PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended skating Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability Lightweight Pro Vulc Lite construction Van Doren™ Gum Rubber Compound offers grip and support Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Skate Curren Caples by Atiba Jefferson
subtitle: United Through Skateboarding.
short_description: The Curren by Atiba for Vans.
style_description: Atiba customized Curren Caples’ pro model with insoles featuring a photo he snapped of Curren’s best-caught tre flip, along with a custom hand-drawn logo by his friend and legendary graffiti artist, Haze. Featuring SickStick™ rubber, a Popcush™ insole for maximum cushioning and Duracap™ underlays for extra protection where it matters most, this is a skate shoe celebrating skating.
details: Signature skate low-top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather upper for a durable and elevated look White primary lace, includes additional set of emerald green laces Padded collar for support and comfort PopCush™ insoles are designed for maximum cushioning without sacrificing boardfeel DuraCap™ underlays add extra durability and protection where it matters most Custom insoles featuring a printed skate photograph of Curren by Atiba Custom SideStripe™ tread pattern with SickStick™ rubber for on-board grip and durability Logo designed by Atiba's friend and legendary graffiti artist, Haze Vans X Curren Caples print on tongue Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility

title: Skate Ave 2.0 Shoe
subtitle: Pushing boundaries.
short_description: Our most technically-advanced skate shoe ever.
style_description: Together, Vans and AVE have consistently delivered the most progressive skate shoes, and his latest pro model is our best yet. Featuring the revolutionary UltimateWaffle™ sole, the AVE 2.0 pulls from decades of footwear innovation to set a new standard by combining grip and cushioning with unrivaled support and durability.
details: Skate low-top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede and knit upper blends durability with comfort LuxLiner provides a comfortable extension of tongue, allowing for stabilization and responsive boardfeel RapidWeld™ stitchless construction for improved fit and feel with a no-sew welded upper for seamless durability DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity UltraCush™ foam cushioning provide a more comfortable ride SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Padded collar for support and comfort Clear TPU midfoot adds support and modern style TPU heel clip adds support and locks in a secure fit Breathable sides, heel, and tongue keep feet cool during intense skate sessions UltimateWaffle™ is a full-length molded midsole with built-in impact cushioning, superior grip, and flex support Lace-up closure for a secure and customizable fit

title: BMX Sk8-Hi Gum Shoe
subtitle: Taking it higher.
short_description: The original high-top, reinforced for modern BMX.
style_description: The BMX Sk8-Hi is a legendary style formulated for modern riding. This upgraded silhouette offers unrivaled BMX innovation, featuring Wafflecup™ for maximum pedalfeel, Duracap™ for enhanced durability and an iconic high-top design that perfectly blends protection with iconic style.
details: Flat pedal BMX/MTB low-top shoe Designed for riding with enhanced durability and performance features Sturdy suede and canvas upper for comfortable durability DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating VDFPR (Van Doren Factory Pedal Recipe) rubber sole delivers enhanced pedal grip and durability Padded collar for support and comfort Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Wafflecup™ combines cupsole support and durability with vulcanized pedal feel and flexibility Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit

title: BMX Proof Wafflecup Shoe
subtitle: Built for BMX. Backed by tech.
short_description: Pedal-tuned grip, reinforced durability, and lasting comfort.
style_description: BMX WaffleCup™ is the first-ever construction to deliver the support of a cupsole without giving up the pedal feel of a vulc. Designed with input from the Vans BMX team, it features our SickStick™ gum rubber for next-level grip, reinforced Duracap™ underlays for long-lasting wear, and PopCush™ insoles to cushion hard landings and reduce leg fatigue. Whether you're pushing limits or putting in miles, this construction is made to keep up—no matter how hard you ride.
details: WaffleCup™ BMX construction balances pedalfeel and support SickStick™ rubber compound delivers superior grip and durability Duracap™ reinforced rubber underlays in high-wear areas PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating Medial crank protection and reinforced heel/toe zones extend longevity Bike-specific rubber outsole designed for grip and pedal control

title: Premium Old Skool Wrap Karina Shoe
subtitle: New Future.
short_description: Karina brings her effortless style to the Old Skool with a vintage-inspired design featuring custom metal hardware on an asymmetrical wrap upper.
style_description: Karina is one of the most stylish and talented surfers around. Her reverence for traditional longboarding flows perfectly with her effortless on-board style. But out of the water, Karina embraces the modern. Whether it’s making jewelry, fashion design, painting, poetry or filmmaking, she’s always searching for a creative outlet. With an asymmetrical wrap upper and custom metal hardware, Karina brings her vintage-meets-modern aesthetic to the Premium Old Skool.
details: Reimagined low top shoe Leather upper for a smooth, durable finish Metal D-ring and hook eyelets closure Soft leather collar for enhanced comfort Distinctive asymmetrical textured Wrap toe Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Co-branded Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Iconic leather Sidestripe™

title: Skate Gilbert Crockett Shoe
subtitle: Obsessed with every detail.
short_description: Built under the watchful eye of Gilbert Crocket for undeniable skate performance.
style_description: Gilbert Crockett is an old soul, humbly pushing his skating and design in a direction rooted in heritage, history and style. So it’s no surprise that the same sense of quality and detail bled into his pro model: the Skate Gilbert Crockett. Built on a low-top silhouette, this vulcanized shoe blends a clean aesthetic with all the features you need to push your own progression.
details: Signature low-top skate shoe Inspired by the original 1999 Rowley skate shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather and mesh upper blends durability with comfort DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Internal tongue straps prevents it from sliding during movement A molded heel counter provides structure support, improving stability and fit Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia "66/99'' honors Vans' 1966 founding and the Rowley shoe's 1999 debut Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Lace closure for an adjustable fit

title: Toddler Old Skool V Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: Est. '77 Feel Something New.
short_description: The birth of our iconic SideStripe™, there’s always something new with the Old Skool.
style_description: The Toddler Old Skool V Checkerboard reimagines our iconic Sidestripe shoe by swapping traditional laces for double hook-and-loop closures. Featuring our signature checkerboard print, this low-top style maintains its classic appeal while providing an easy, secure fit that keeps your little one comfortable all day.
details: Toddler low-top shoe Recommended for ages 9 months to 4 years Sturdy suede and canvas uppers Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Double hook-and-loop closures for easy on-and-off Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Checkerboard branding is unmistakably Vans

title: Skate Rowan Shoe
subtitle: Nobody like him, nothing like it.
short_description: Rowan Zorilla's first signature shoe, with modern skate features and a vulcanized sole.
style_description: Every time Rowan Zorilla steps on his board, it's a live performance. He makes the most difficult skating look effortless, and his first signature shoe was designed with that in mind. The Rowan may look laid back on its surface, but dig a little deeper and the layers of complexity begin to reveal themselves. With progressive features and time-tested materials, this vulcanized shoe encourages you to put on a performance of your own.
details: Signature low-top skate shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Leather and suede upper DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity Padded collar for support and comfort PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia Vans Rowan patch

title: Vans X Odyssey BMX Classic Slip-On WaffleCup Shoe
subtitle: Vans × Odyssey
short_description: Celebrating 40 years of Odyssey with an all-new BMX design.
style_description: The Vans X Odyssey Slip-On BMX WaffleCup™ is designed for on-bike progression and off-bike style. Reinforced with DURACAP™ underlays, cushioned by PopCush™ impact protection, and finished with our BMX-specific WaffleCup™ outsole, this limited-edition release honors 40 years of Odyssey with an allover letter print and custom co-branded detail
details: Reinforced and refined for on-bike performance Suede upper for a soft, textured finish Limited edition colorway featuring co-branding and logos celebrates 40 years of Odyssey Reinforced construction with DURACAP™ underlays for a longer-lasting BMX shoe. WaffleCup™ BMX outsole blends cupsole support with vulcanized pedalfeel Custom printed PopCush™ insoles provide maximum cushioning for high-impact riding Our new VDFPR rubber compound is formulated for balanced pedalfeel and unmatched grip Elastic side panels for easy slip-on and off Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Allover tonal ODYSSEY letter print Custom packaging

title: Invado Pro X Rene Rinnekangas Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Pro. Park. Performance.
short_description: With an arsenal of features boosting its fit and versatility, the Invado Pro brings pro-level performance to every trick you try.
style_description: The Invado Pro is one of the most versatile snowboard boots available. Combining the unlimited customization of Vans Hybrid BOA Fit System with the unmatched heel hold of the Custom Slide Guide and the comfort and warmth of the V2 UltraCush Smartwool liner, the Invado Pro delivers pro-level performance in any situation. Add in the terrain management of a V2 Waffle Pro outsole and the heat-moldable core of the liner and you have unparalleled comfort and a perfect fit.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street terrain, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Textile and synthetic upper Flex rating: 5-7 Skill level: intermediate, advanced V2 UltraCush™ with Smartwool Liner uses odor-resistant, thermoregulating Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush™ cushioning layer for a liner that is warm but breathable, with a Comfort Flex neoprene toe box and X-Cage for superior heel hold V2 PopCush™ Footbed utilizes dual-density PopCush™ construction, a 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, and a TPU arch support heel clip for stability while allowing for torsional flex Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V2 Waffle Pro Outsole with All-Trac Cold Weather Rubber Compound provides natural flex and a weight-reducing, impact-resisting UltraCush midsole provide sensitive boardfeel, while a Vans-exclusive lug tread pattern gives you the traction you need to explore the sidecountry with confidence BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: Premium Old Skool Cocona Shoe
subtitle: New Future.
short_description: Celebrating the connections she makes through skateboarding, Cocona adds friendship bracelets and charms to her energetic Old Skool design.
style_description: As one of the brightest young stars in skateboarding, Cocona is always on the road—connecting and skating with friends across the globe. She’s constantly crafting, drawing and making friendship bracelets in between skate sessions. Cocona’s energetic Premium Old Skool reflects these off-board passions with a removable friendship bracelet and charm inspired by her Japanese heritage, along with her custom artwork on the translucent outsole.
details: DIY-inspired low top shoe Corduroy upper with suede overlays, DIY embroidery, safety pins, and charms Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Soft leather collar for enhanced comfort Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Co-branded Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Translucent ice waffle outsole with hand-drawn art by Cocona Iconic leather Sidestripe™ with oversized stitched outline

title: Skate Authentic Gum Shoe
subtitle: The original, refined for skateboarding.
short_description: Our Skate Classics are built tough, grip hard and land soft.
style_description: Completely redesigned for modern skateboarding, the Skate Classics deliver what you need for maximum progression. A vulcanized shoe made with classic canvas and suede uppers, the Skate Authentic gives you the iconic look you want while bringing all the performance benefits skateboarders demand.
details: Skate low-top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede and 10 oz canvas upper for a durable and classic look PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection for extended skating DuraCap™  underlays add extra durability and protection to high-wear areas for shoe longevity SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Unpadded, low-profile cuff for a minimalist fit Metal eyelets for improved function and refinement Internal tongue straps prevents it from sliding during movement A molded heel counter provides structure support, improving stability and fit Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Lace-up closure for a secure and customizable fit

title: Big Kids Knu Skool Shoe
subtitle: In With The Knu.
short_description: Oversized laces and puffed-up ’90s attitude on Vans’ signature sole.
style_description: Born in ’98, the Knu Skool took inspiration from the iconic Old Skool to create something entirely its own. This Big Kids version scales down the original, keeping the puffed tongue, chunky laces, and padded collar to bring that signature look to smaller sizes.
details: Youth '90s low-top shoe Recommended for ages 8 - 13 years Suede and canvas upper layers two textures Oversized tongue and padded collar for extra comfort Wide laces for bold style and adjustable, secure fit Heel pulls for ease of entry Puffy 3D Sidestripe™ blends throwback style with a modern edge Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Skate Chukka Low Sidestripe Shoe
subtitle: SideStripe style. Skate ready.
short_description: Blending skate-ready performance with classic Chukka style and our iconic SideStripe.
style_description: The Chukka Low Sidestripe, a vulcanized shoe designed by the Vans skate team and inspired by classics like the Authentic and the Chukka Boot, brings a new heritage aesthetic to this old school skate shoe. Featuring our iconic Sidestripe, this low top silhouette blends classic materials like suede and canvas with the best in boardfeel, flex, and traction.
details: Skate low top shoe Designed for skateboarding with enhanced durability and performance features Suede and 6 oz canvas upper is durable and low profile Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Lace-up closure for a secure and customizable fit PopCush™ footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended skating Higher sidewalls for increased shoe protection and durability Lightweight Pro Vulc Lite construction Van Doren™ Gum Rubber Compound offers grip and support Signature waffle sole pattern outsole for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Premium Mary Jane Super Lowpro Shoe
subtitle: Retro versatility remixed.
short_description: ’80s track style meets Mary Jane in this bold throwback rework.
style_description: The Super Lowpro Mary Jane reimagines a low-profile vintage track sneakers through a new lens—blending the retro lines of our Serio Series with soft nods to Mary Jane styling. From hook-and-loop straps to delicate trim details, it’s a bold crossover that’s made to move.
details: Low-profile, vintage track-inspired sneakers Inspired by ’80s Serio Style 84 Leather upper for a smooth, durable finish Padded collar for comfort and shape Dual hook-and-loop straps for a secure fit and easy on/off EVA midsole and wedge for lightweight cushioning and durability Minimal lining for a soft, barely-there feel OrthoLite® foam insole for cushioning Rubber outsole with Vans’ signature waffle pattern for superior grip Embroidered SideStripe™ for a small hit of heritage Metallic silver leather

title: OTW by Vans X S.R. Studio LA. CA. Future Clog
subtitle: Heritage, Reshaped In Foam.
short_description: Sterling Ruby transforms the dutch clog.
style_description: Sterling Ruby's transformation of a traditional wooden clog brings modern comfort both indoors and out with step-in access and a shoe-within-a-shoe: an organic, minimal mule pulls out of the larger clog. Thoughtful features include a bottom window for breathability, a branded silver button on the outside, and a lightweight, cushioned foam insole for comfort without added weight. With two shoes designed for the coexistent purist and maximalist inside of us, S.R. Studio LA. CA. brings elevated structure and complexity to an everyday design.
details: Lightweight Japanese-style bedroom slipper inside mid-weight high fashion Future Clog; can be worn together or separately Step-in access; low-profile back for easy on/off Breathable window in bottom of chunky clog for ventilation and easy slipper access Silver S.R. Studio LA. CA. branded button Shock-absorbing EVA midsole provides cushioning without added weight Aggressive foam tread on clog, waffle print design on inside slipper Vans X S.R. Studio LA. CA. co-branding on bottom Custom co-branded Vans X S.R. Studio LA. CA. box includes one assembled clog and one dissassembled clog

title: Toddler UltraRange V Shoe
subtitle: A do-it-all shoe for kids on the go.
short_description: Cushioned for comfort and treaded for grip, so your little ones can “get out there” too.
style_description: Vans most versatile shoe design to date, the UltraRange, is now available for kids, bringing comfort and performance to the forefront. Equipped with all the same benefits as the adult version, the Toddler UltraRange 66 V makes sure your little ones can get there too. Finished with our iconic Sidestripe and topped with a hook-and-loop closure for a customized fit, and this kid-approved shoe is ready for anything your day has in store.
details: UltraRange shoe made for toddlers Durable suede and canvas uppers Heritage Sidestripe design Lightweight UltraCush midsoles Co-molded rubber mini-lug outsoles Laces with hook-and-loop closures Heel pull tabs

title: Little Kids Classic Slip-On Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: No laces. Always iconic.
short_description: Skateboarding’s original Slip-On, as iconic as ever.
style_description: What started life in 1979 as the Vans #98 has become one of the most popular shoes in Southern California, and one of the most instantly recognizable shoes in the world. Slip-On shoes are undeniably stylish, but few come close to the Vans Classic Slip-On Checkerboard for instantaneous excellence. This is a design that never goes out of fashion and a shoe that never loses its comfort. When it comes to Vans Off the Wall style, this kid-sized checkered Slip-On shoe is an everyday essential.
details: Iconic Slip-On shoe made for kids Low profile canvas uppers Classic checkerboard print Supportive padded collars Elastic side accents Signature rubber waffle outsoles

title: Authentic Lowpro Shoe
subtitle: Low and legendary.
short_description: A slimmed-down version of the iconic Authentic featuring a lower sidewall.
style_description: The Authentic Lowpro returns with elevated suede uppers in unexpected colors, bringing a sleek look to this slimmed-down silhouette. Finished with iconic rubber waffle outsoles and the recognizable aesthetic of our original Authentic, the Authentic Lowpro is a timeless take on a perennial classic.
details: Low-top shoe Sleeker, low-profile silhouette Durable suede uppers built to last Unpadded, low-profile cuff for a minimalist fit Metal eyelets. Four on sizes 3.5 - 6 and five on sizes 6.5+ Durable rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit Reinforced toe bumper for heavy wear and tear Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility

title: OTW by Vans X NEIGHBORHOOD Half Cab 33
subtitle: Craft With Pride Tokyo Est. 1994
short_description: NEIGHBORHOOD's take on the legendary signature Style 33.
style_description: The OTW by Vans x NEIGHBORHOOD® Half Cab 33 is raw, restrained, and built with intent. Blacked-out suede and “Filth” and “Fury” toe embossing bring punk to a clean-lined signature. The lengendary mid-top stays true to its DIY roots while NEIGHBORHOOD’s Tokyo touches and comfort upgrades sharpen the ride.
details: Signature mid-top shoe originally known as Style 33 Suede upper gives a soft, textured finish Monochromatic black "Filth" and "Fury" embossed detailing on the toe Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Woven co-branded tongue label Higher sidewall with "Craft with pride Tokyo Est. 1994" embossed design "NBHD" embossed design on heel Upgraded footbed and refined construction provides improved fit and feel Co-branded Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern in grey OTW grey logo heel scab Custom packaging

subtitle: No laces. Always iconic.

details: Iconic Slip-On shoe made for toddlers Side hook-and-loop closures Heel pull tabs Low profile textile uppers Checkerboard print Supportive padded collars Elastic side accents Signature rubber waffle outsoles

title: Chukka Low Sidestripe Shoe
subtitle: SideStripe style. Skate ready.
short_description: Blending skate-ready performance with classic Chukka style and our iconic SideStripe.
style_description: The Chukka Low Sidestripe, a vulcanized shoe designed by the Vans skate team and inspired by classics like the Authentic and the Chukka Boot, brings a new heritage aesthetic to this old school skate shoe. Featuring our iconic Sidestripe, this low top silhouette blends classic materials like suede and canvas with the best in boardfeel, flex, and traction.
details: ULTIMATE BOARDFEEL, FLEX, AND GRIP - A lighter version of our iconic construction, Pro Vulc Lite features single-wrapped, high-wall vulcanization along with drop-in cushioning. POPCUSH CUSHIONING - Our best cushioning and impact protection. PopCush energy return footbeds protect your feet while helping to lessen leg fatigue for longer skate sessions. CLASSIC GUM RUBBER GRIP - The Van Doren Gum Rubber Compound, made of a rubber that offers grip and support, is what attracted skaters to Vans in the first place. This is the Sole of Skateboarding. ICONIC STYLING - Blending our heritage Sidestripe with the aesthetic of the original Chukka silhouette, this is a classic low top style made with suede and 10 oz canvas uppers.

Lugged outsole incorporates multi-directional treads, multi-level surfacing, and a siped tire-like design for increased traction in wet conditions. Single-density UltraCush molded EVA footbed provides enhanced comfort for all-day wear.

A print on the outsole mimics the iconic Vans waffle sole, and the addition of a Vans heel scab completes the classic look.
details: Iconic Slip-On shoe made for infants Side hook-and-loop closures Heel pull tabs Elastic accents Canvas and suede uppers Signature checkerboard print Outsole print that mimics the classic Vans waffle sole

title: OTW Old Skool 36 FM
subtitle: Built on Frequency.
short_description: An icon reimagined and inspired by signatures of sound.
style_description: An icon tuned to a new frequency. The OTW Old Skool 36 FM reimagines heritage through the lens of sound—layering texture, movement, and vibration into every step. With a sculpted silhouette and tonal design that resonates with subtle archival cues, this drop ushers in the first chapter of Future Make—a new OTW by Vans platform rooted in exploration and innovation.
details: Future Make series, release 1 Tonal off-white design for a clean, streamlined aesthetic Lofted engineered-knit cotton upper and tongue for added breathable comfort Heavy-duty round laces 3D-injected Sidestripe gives a futuristic aesthetic, plus structural support Molded rubber toe cap and heel for enhanced durability Reinterpreted waffle pattern outsole inspired by FM radio frequencies adds increased grip Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased

title: Standard Zip Waterproof Boot
subtitle: Your winter go-to.
short_description: Zip up and conquer the cold with unparalleled warmth, waterproofing and style.
style_description: The Standard Zip Waterproof Boot brings convenience to the Standard boot lineup family with a side zipper for effortless entry and exit. As with all Standard models, the waterproof vulcanized lower keeps you dry, the removable felt liner offers next-level warmth, and the All-Trac outsole provides reliable traction anywhere, anytime.
details: Leather and rubber upper. Waterproof vulcanized and seam-sealed construction to keep your feet dry in wet-weather conditions. Waterproof medial zip closure for effortless entry and exit. Snow MTE™ felt liner thermal package for warmth in cold temperatures. Standard Snow MTE™ outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound for traction on various terrain and conditions.

title: OTW by Vans X NEIGHBORHOOD Classic Slip-On 98
subtitle: Craft With Pride Tokyo Est. 1994
short_description: A monochrome slip-on reworked with NH precision.
style_description: The OTW by Vans x NEIGHBORHOOD® Classic Slip-On 98 redefines an icon through minimalist precision. Honoring NEIGHBORHOOD’s “Craft with Pride” ethos, this tonal white execution pairs soft suede with embossed details that nod to Tokyo roots. Upgraded inside and out, it’s not just a Slip-On—it’s a study in precision, executed through a classic silhouette.
details: Iconic slip-on shoe originally known as Style 98 Suede upper gives a soft, textured finish Monochromatic white Padded collar for support and comfort Elastic side panels for easy slip-on and off Neighborhood branded embossed detailing on the toe Higher sidewall with "Craft with pride Tokyo Est. 1994" embossed design "NBHD" embossed design on heel Upgraded footbed and refined construction provides improved fit and feel Co-branded Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern in grey OTW grey logo heel scab Custom packaging

title: Little Kids Mary Jane Shoe
style_description: Tapping into retro nostalgia and a playful interpretation of femininity, the Vans Mary Jane takes this timeless silhouette and cranks it up a notch. Pairing a simple buckle and strap with a rubber toe cap, glittery uppers, and our signature rubber waffle outsole, the Kids Mary Jane delivers the perfect blend of casual and classy, ideal for . . . well, just about anything.
details: Mary Jane-style silhouette made for kids Glitter textile and synthetic uppers Buckle closures Rubber toe caps Signature rubber waffle outsoles

title: UltraRange Neo VR3 Shoe
subtitle: Ultra-light. Ultra-comfortable.
short_description: A lightweight design with a breathable upper and ultra-comfy VR3CUSH™ outsole.
style_description: Here, there, anywhere. Combining comfort and versatility, the UltraRange Neo VR3 lets you take on the unexpected moments of your day while making a choice along your journey. Our team has set ambitious sustainability goals. Big or small, all of our efforts add up to positive change. To earn the Checkerboard globe logo, at least 30% of the product must be made up of one or a combination of recycled, renewable, and/or regenerative materials.
details: Lightweight low-top with cushioning and moderate traction Suede and mesh upper blends durability with comfort Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit Heel pull assists with slipping the shoes on quickly Bio-Based EVA midsole for maximum cushioning For maximum cushioning, the midsole, made using at least 25% biobased EVA foam partially derived from plants, is USDA Certified Biobased Molded heel cup and arch shape for underfoot support Lightly trended outsole for moderate traction The Checkerboard Globe logo signifies that 30% of the product is made of one or a combination of Regenerative, Renewable, and/or Recycled materials

title: Toddler SK8-Hi Side Zip Checkerboard Shoe
subtitle: The original skate hi-top.
short_description: The original skate hi-top, the Sk8-Hi is classic on any stage.
style_description: The Toddler Sk8-Hi Side Zip reinvigorates our legendary Sidestripe high top with a vintage sensibility and zippers along the eyelets, offering increased access and versatility on this timeless favorite.
details: Toddler high top shoe Recommended for ages 9 months to 4 years Sturdy suede and canvas uppers Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Double hook-and-loop closures for easy on and off Tongue pull assists with slipping the shoes on quickly Rubber sidewall with classic foxing stripe Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Toddler Sk8-Hi Zip Water Resistant Shoe
subtitle: Keep dry. Keep up.
short_description: Their favorite high-tops, now ready for anything with a water-resistant upper.
style_description: The Sk8-Hi is an all-time classic, but the Toddler Sk8-Hi takes it a step further with playtime in mind. Featuring a water-resistant suede upper, a Primaloft insulation package and an outsole designed for superior traction, you get a shoe that can truly keep up—no matter where they run off to.
details: Water-resistant upper for reliable, comfortable, breathable moisture management protection. Primaloft insulation package traps warmth without retaining internal moisture. Lugged outsole incorporates multi-directional treads, multi-level surfacing, and a siped tire-like design for increased traction in wet conditions. Single-density UltraCush molded EVA footbed provides enhanced comfort for all-day wear.

title: Little Kids UltraRange V Shoe
subtitle: Always Ready.
short_description: An all-terrain style for the little ones.
style_description: The versatile UltraRange is now available for kids, bringing comfort and performance to the forefront. Equipped with all the same benefits as the adult version, the Kids UltraRange 66 V makes sure your little ones can get there too. Finished with our iconic Sidestripe and topped with a hook-and-loop closure that makes them easy to slip on and off.
details: UltraRange shoe made for kids Durable suede and canvas uppers Laces with hook-and-loop closures Lightweight UltraCush midsoles Rubber mini-lug outsoles for traction Heel pull tabs for easy on/off Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Mid-Slip Insulated Shoe
subtitle: Insulated icon.
short_description: Slip-On convenience meets all-weather protection.
style_description: With a water-repellant upper and insulation package, the Mid-Slip Insulated shoe is a contemporary cold-weather classic. Experience the perfect blend of slip-on convenience and all-weather protection to last all winter long.
details: Leather, suede, and textile upper DWR (durable water repellent) coating to shed light moisture 100-gram insulation package for reliable warmth in cold temperatures Ultracush™ drop-in footbed for all-day comfort and support Part of our MTE™—Made for the Elements—collection, built for water protection, thermal regulation, and traction when you need it most 60% of the outsole compound is regeneratively grown natural rubber sourced from farms utilizing agricultural practices that are intended to promote biodiversity, enhance water cycles, improve soil health and/or sequester carbon

title: Surf Boot 2 Hi V 5MM
style_description: This is the boot you've been waiting for. Built to exceed the needs of our team, every inch and every stitch has been crafted for comfort and performance to bring your style to life in all conditions. Placing a premium on boardfeel and grip, the Surf Boot 2 Hi V 5mm takes everything we know about skate shoes and packages it up in a surf bootie. Pure performance never looked so good.
details: High-top surf boot 5 mm neoprene Round toe construction for universal fit Liquid rubber dipped around the foot shape for warmth and support Hook-and-loop strap for maximum adjustability

title: Skate Lizzie Shoe
subtitle: Lizzie's Way.
short_description: Designed with inclusivity in mind, built alongside Vans team rider Lizzie Armanto.
style_description: The Skate Lizzie Shoe is Lizzie Armanto's original, signature skate shoe designed with Lizzie as a unique solution to the universal problems of skate shoes, providing a better fitting, durable, and sustainable solution for all skateboarders. Created with organic materials and inclusivity in mind, Lizzie and Vans are proud to deliver something completely different for a new generation of skateboarders. Our team has set ambitious sustainability goals. Big or small, all of our efforts add up to positive change. These Skate Lizzies were featured in Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4, cementing their impact in skateboarding forever.
details: Signature high top skate shoe 100% organic cotton and suede upper As seen in Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 3 + 4 Made using recycled, renewable, and/or regenerative materials Unpadded, low-profile cuff for a minimalist fit Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit Internal tongue straps prevents it from sliding during movement Low-profile footbed balances boardfeel and impact protection DuraCap™ is a thin rubber underlay designed specifically for skateboarding, placed in key areas to protect against griptape wear SickStick™ rubber—our stickiest yet—keeps you glued to your board Universal fit designed by Lizzie to meet the needs of a wider range of skateboarders Outsole utilizes flex grooves, waffle lugs and micro-waffle pattern for grip and flexibility Iconic Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Authentic Almond Shoe
subtitle: New Shape. Timeless style.
short_description: Sleek low-top design with an elevated almond toe shape.
style_description: The Vans Authentic evolves with a new shape and premium cushioning. This iconic shoe blends heritage style with modern updates, featuring a durable canvas upper and signature waffle outsole. The almond toe shape adds a contemporary edge, while insole cushioning provides all-day comfort. With its versatile look and superior feel, this reimagined classic is ready for anything.
details: Heritage low top with profile build Canvas upper for a durable and classic look Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Metal eyelets. Four on sizes 3.5 - 6 and five on sizes 6.5+ Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Women's Encore Pro Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Versatile and capable.
short_description: An advanced, customizable boot ready for everywhere you want to ride.
style_description: Designed as an advanced and versatile boot for all environments, the Encore Pro packs comfort, control, and timeless style in equal measure. With dual-zone BOA® Fit System for on-the-fly micro-adjustability and a V2 PopCush™ Footbed for stability, this boot is designed to not just lap the park and resort, but attack it. Add in the V2 UltraCush™ Smartwool® liner for thermoregulation, and the Encore Pro just might become your new favorite part of snowboarding.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street terrain, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Flex rating: 4-5 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper for added visual interest V2 UltraCush™ with Smartwool Liner uses odor-resistant, thermoregulating Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush™ cushioning layer for a liner that is warm but breathable, with a Comfort Flex neoprene toe box and X-Cage for superior heel hold V2 PopCush™ Footbed utilizes dual-density PopCush™ construction, a 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, and a TPU arch support heel clip for stability while allowing for torsional flex Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable V2 Harness allows for customizable heel hold, working in tandem with the V2 liner for enhanced support and a personalized fit Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported

title: Standard Waterproof Boot
subtitle: Ready for winter.
short_description: Built to handle the elements with waterproof construction and 100-gram weight insulation.
style_description: The Standard Waterproof Boot is the modern standard in winter boots' waterproofing, warmth, and traction wrapped in Vans style. Complete with a waterproof vulcanized look, heavy-duty felt liner, and Standard Snow MTE outsole featuring All-Trac all-terrain rubber, this Sidestripe snow boot is a contemporary cold weather classic in the Vans family, and the obvious choice for all your winter needs. It is made with leather and rubber uppers.
details: Waterproof boots Waterproof vulcanized construction seam-sealed construction, keeps snow and wet out 100-gram weight insulation package to keeps you warm All-Trac, a cold weather-specific all-terrain rubber tread for traction in variable terrain

title: Premium Authentic Point Shoe
subtitle: Iconic shape, modern point of view.
short_description: A fashion-forward take on our classic Authentic with a distinctive pointed toe design.
style_description: The Premium Authentic Point reimagines Vans' original icon with a sophisticated pointed toe design. Drawing on our heritage while stepping into new style territory. The 8 oz canvas construction stays true to the Authentic's legacy while the Sola Foam ADC insole delivers cushioned support. Finished with our signature waffle outsole for reliable grip, this is where heritage meets modern design.
details: Low-profile sneaker with distinct pointed toe shape Suede upper for a soft, textured finish Cotton lace and metal eyelets, includes second set of laces Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Flat crepe outsole for soft, flexible comfort and natural grip Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Women's Luna Pro Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Your go-anywhere ride.
short_description: Our most progressive all-terrain women's snowboard boot, the Luna Pro is hyper-focused on performance and progression.
style_description: A team favorite, the Luna Pro brings next-level performance and all-terrain versatility. Engineered with all-mountain versatility in mind, this medium-flexing snowboard boot features a Hybrid BOA® Fit System for on-the-fly adjustability and an Instep Flex Zone for smooth and natural ankle flexion. Add a heat-moldable, dual-density liner, and you get a boot made just for you.
details: Optimized for all-mountain and park/street Flex rating: 4-5 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper for added visual interest V1 UltraCush™ Liner features an UltraCush™ interior layer, a dual-density heat-moldable core for customized fit, a comfort flex neoprene toe box, and a closed-seam brushed fleece cuff Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot Our V1 Harness is our lightest and simplest harness, designed to ensure effective support and heel hold when paired with our V1 liner Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported V1 PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection V1 Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions

title: Authentic Hi 2.0 Shoe
subtitle: The original, elevated.
short_description: A modern elevation of our original classic with added height and attitude.
style_description: The Authentic Hi 2.0 builds on our legendary skate heritage, taking Vans' first-ever silhouette to new heights. This evolution features a sturdy canvas upper with our signature vulcanized build, adding a touch of ankle coverage while keeping the unmistakable grip of the original waffle outsole that skaters have trusted since 1966.
details: Heritage silhouette with high-top build Canvas upper for a durable and classic look Deconstructed (unpadded) paneling for a lighter, more flexible fit Cotton lace and metal eyelets Snug fit around the ankle for added support Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Vulcanized build for the original look and feel

title: Women's Encore Linerless Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Comfort, Simplified.
short_description: All-day comfort with hassle-free entry and exit from linerless technology.
style_description: The Encore Linerless redefines simplicity and modern comfort. No other women's snowboard boot offers the combined convenience of a BOA® Fit System and the hassle-free entry and exit of linerless technology. Plus, an improved lightweight UltraCush™ internal cushioning construction and V1 PopCush™ Footbed provide all-day comfort. No matter where you go after first chair, linerless technology is an entirely different way of approaching your snowboard boots and your riding.
details: All-mountain boot optimized for versatility from parks to powder and everything in between Flex rating: 3-4 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper Lightweight, linerless construction and slimmed-down upper for reduced size and weight V1 PopCush™ Footbeds use 3D anatomical shaping to offer the highest level of impact protection Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported Increased internal foam package for a soft, cushioned feel that lasts 'til last chair Heat Retention 360° uses a layer of 200g insulation over the toes so they stay warm during the coldest temps. With a liner material of neoprene and EVA, moisture is wicked away from the foot V1 Waffle Lug Outsole with All-Trac cold weather rubber compound delivers precise boardfeel and traction in all conditions BOA® Fit System provides a secure fit with on-the-fly micro-adjustability

title: Soft-Top Sandal
style_description: For all your beachy days and nights, the MTE Soft-Top Sandal is a classic flip-flop, but not the kind you're used to. The Vans® aesthetic stands out, with durable waffle-pattern blown rubber outsoles with grip and additional style details. But where this sandal becomes the pair you always reach for is in the UltraCush footbeds, made with PU memory foam and arch support to keep you moving long after the sun goes down.
details: Flip-flop sandal Synthetic strap with neoprene lining Webbing toe post construction for a comfortable fit Comfortable UltraCush footbeds with PU memory foam Anatomical arch for comfort and support Durable waffle pattern blown rubber outsoles Made with water-based inks and glues

title: Hi-Country Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Precise lines, in or out of bounds.
short_description: A resort and backcountry boot enhanced with a quick-drying liner and waterproof technology to keep you moving all day.
style_description: The Hi-Country is designed to take your lines to the next level on the mountain and in the backcountry. The footbed offers our highest level of impact cushioning, while the Vans Flex Control System and PowerCuff Strap offers custom flex tuning and an outsole with multi-directional tread for confidence and all-terrain preparedness. A waterproof zipper shroud, D-ring gaiter hooks, one-way breathable valves, and the quick drying liner promise unmatched moisture management. The Hi-Country will not only take you where you want to go, but it’ll give you the tools to show up in style.
details: Backcountry and all-mountain boot with versatility taking you from parks to rails to steep, deep terrain Flex rating: 5-8 Skill level: intermediate to advanced Soft microsuede cuff and tongue V3 UltraCush™ The North Face FlashDry™ liner is enhanced with The North Face FlashDry materialization for moisture-wicking, quick dry capabilities Neoprene forefoot and an updated X-cage for superior heel hold V3 PopCush™ Footbed features a 3D molded anatomical shape, TPU arch support heel clip, an OrthoLite® top layer, and airflow perforations for breathability Waterproof Zipper Shroud + D Ring is a durable, weatherproof fabric shield blocks moisture out of your boot. It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow. Vans Flex Control System uses high-rebound Hytrel tongue stiffeners for boot flex adjustability. As your boots soften up over time, add the tongue stiffeners back in to extend the life of your boots. Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet Asymmetrical Flex Zone allows your knees to flex in a more natural way with larger flex zones on the inside of the foot for precise control while carving Our V3 Harness offers our most advanced support to the ankle and instep, keeping the liner and boot shell locked in V3 Superenduro Waffle Outsole is inspired by moto endurance racing with a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, and a TPU toe pick for added traction and snow tread

title: Premium Style 17 Mule
subtitle: Ultimate ease.
short_description: Comfort and convenience get a fashion-forward upgrade.
style_description: The Premium Style 17 Mule hits the sweet spot between casual shoes and flip-flops. Pairing premium materials with an upgraded footbed, a Sola Foam ADC insole, and a grippy, lugged outsole for traction, this shoe is an outdoor shoe with full indoor ease.
details: Slip-On mule Waterproof suede upper for a durable, versatile shoe Low-profile back for easy on/off Soft lining ideal for wearing with or without socks Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Lugged outsole for added traction

title: Vans Pearl and Lace Shoe Charm Set
subtitle: Feminine Frill.
short_description: Delicate details adorn your shoes with timeless elegance.
style_description: Soft, vintage details come together with a romantic theme in this charm set. A pearl chain adds a touch of glamor and femininity, while white shoelaces soften any shoe. A bow crystal charm and gold heart charm top things off for a warm, shiny finish.
details: Shoe charm, chain and shoelace set 2 shoe charms with round gold clips and hardware 1 pearl chain 45" long white lace shoelaces Includes: bow crystal charm, gold heart charm, chain, and shoelaces Contains small parts. Not intended for children under 12 years old.

title: Women's Encore Pro X Mia Brookes Snowboard Boot
subtitle: Versatile and capable.
short_description: An advanced, customizable boot ready for everywhere you want to ride.
style_description: Designed as an advanced and versatile boot for all environments, the Encore Pro packs comfort, control, and timeless style in equal measure. With dual-zone BOA® Fit System for on-the-fly micro-adjustability and a V2 PopCush™ Footbed for stability, this boot is designed to not just lap the park and resort, but attack it. Add in the V2 UltraCush™ Smartwool® liner for thermoregulation, and the Encore Pro just might become your new favorite part of snowboarding.
details: Designed for all-mountain and park/street terrain, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to cruising groomers with ease Flex rating: 4-5 Skill level: beginner to intermediate Textile and synthetic upper for added visual interest V2 UltraCush™ with Smartwool Liner uses odor-resistant, thermoregulating Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush™ cushioning layer for a liner that is warm but breathable, with a Comfort Flex neoprene toe box and X-Cage for superior heel hold V2 PopCush™ Footbed utilizes dual-density PopCush™ construction, a 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, and a TPU arch support heel clip for stability while allowing for torsional flex Footbed's nylex moisture-wicking top-sheet keeps you dry and comfortable V2 Harness allows for customizable heel hold, working in tandem with the V2 liner for enhanced support and a personalized fit Instep Flex Zone maintains natural ankle flexion in your boot, even strapped into your bindings PleasureCuff's supple elasticity delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit, keeping your calves supported

title: Nexpa Sandal
subtitle: As classic as they come
short_description: Reliable flip flops that you can reach for day in and day out
style_description: The Nexpa Synthetic is a classic. When you need reliable flip flops that you can reach for day in and day out, to the beach and back again' this pair has you covered. A timeless Vans aesthetic paired with soft synthetic nubuck straps, the Nexpa Synthetic sandal delivers the style you want and the comfort you crave.
details: Synthetic nubuck straps with heritage details Soft rubber-backed stretch textile linings Super-soft, molded UltraCush Lite EVA footbeds with anatomical arch support Durable rubber outsoles Made with water-based inks and glues

title: Infuse Snowsurf Snowboard Boot
subtitle: High-end performance.
short_description: The Infuse SnowSurf boot uses high-end features to tap into the simplicity of riding.
style_description: Born from Japanese culture and inspired by natural mountain contours, the Infuse SnowSurf boot uses high-end features to tap into the pure simplicity of riding. This new model combines an UltraCush™ midsole for sensitive boardfeel, a liner with moisture wicking benefits and arch support, and a BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide for customized fit anywhere you go. An asymmetrical flex pattern and Powercuff Strap create enhanced stability and mobility to ensure versatile and fluid rides from edge to edge.
details: Designed for the backcountry, all-mountain terrain, and park/street, this boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails in urban environments to steep, deep terrain Flex rating: 6-9 Skill level: intermediate to advanced V3 UltraCush™ The North Face FlashDry™ liner is enhanced with The North Face FlashDry materialization, a neoprene forefoot, an updated X-cage for superior heel hold, and a soft microsuede cuff and tongue Vans Flex Control System for enhanced control while riding Waterproof Zipper Shroud + D Ring is a durable, weatherproof fabric shield blocks moisture out of your boot. It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow Powercuff Strap for extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response Waterproof, Breathable Valves ensure breathability and thermal regulation by transporting moisture away from your feet V3 PopCush™ Footbed features a 3D molded anatomical shape, TPU arch support heel clip, an OrthoLite® top layer, and airflow perforations for breathability Asymmetrical Flex Zone allows your knees to flex in a more natural way with larger flex zones on the inside of the foot for precise control while carving V2 Harness allows for customizable heel hold, working in tandem with the V2 liner for enhanced support and a personalized fit V2 Waffle Pro Outsole with All-Trac Cold Weather Rubber Compound provides natural flex and a weight-reducing, impact-resisting UltraCush™ midsole provide sensitive boardfeel, while a Vans-exclusive lug tread pattern gives you the traction you need to explore the sidecountry with confidence BOA® Fit System with Vans Custom Slide Guide features a high-power coiler dial and mid-power remote dial to control three zones of fit, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold

title: Gel Cleaner
subtitle: Brightens, scrubs, and revives.
short_description: Brush-on gel cleaner designed to lift dirt and restore your footwear’s look.
style_description: The Vans Gel Cleaner is built to go deep on grime. With a brush-top applicator and a formula that brightens and cleans, it’s especially effective on white rubber bumpers and safe to use on leather, canvas, mesh, nylon, and synthetics. Just scrub, rinse, and get back to it.
details: Brush-top applicator for easy scrubbing Brightens and cleans white rubber bumpers Safe for leather, canvas, mesh, nylon, and synthetics Helps remove dirt and stains from multiple materials Ingredients: water, sodium laureth sulfate, carbomer, fragrance, preservatives

title: OTW Era 95 Vibram
subtitle: Crocodile embossed Icon.
short_description: Contrasting statement leather and full-grain nubuck enhance the beloved Era silhouette.
style_description: The OTW by Vans Era 95 Vibram revamps an iconic silhouette. With a rich upper crafted from crocodile-embossed leather and full-grain nubuck, this shoe brings a new level of texture and sophistication to a familiar form. Every aspect, from the padded collar and tonal eyelets to the thick wool laces and leather-branded footbed, is intentional. Colorblocked Racing Red and Navy Blue combine for an iconic '70s throwback combo with ties to Vans' early skate days and nostalgia from the last 50 years for a statement ready for today.
details: Heritage low-top shoe originally known as Style 95 Crocodile embossed patent leather and full-grain nubuck leather upper Padded collar for support and comfort Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Two sets of thick wool laces with a Marshmallow main lace and Racing Red second lace Flat tonal eyelets matching upper Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Branded leather footbed Vans' custom Vibram vulcanized outsole with tank tread for all-terrain grip on wet and dry surfaces To keep your shoes in the best condition possible, avoid immersing in water and if wet, dry at room temperature out of the sun

title: Vans Beaded Board Shoe Charm Set
subtitle: Decked Out.
short_description: Your personal style, down to your toes.
style_description: The mini version of what makes Vans, Vans. Four charms with silver hardware--including a checkerboard slip-on and skateboard--add extra Vans style to your shoes, and the color bead chain adds extra texture and vibrancy with every step. Refresh your most reliable shoes with a skate twist.
details: Shoe charm and chain set 4 shoe charms with silver round clips and hardware 11.5" long color bead chain Includes: checker shoe charm, red mushroom charm, skateboard charm, yellow star charm and chain Contains small parts. Not intended for children under 12 years old

title: Vans Retro California Shoe Charm Set
subtitle: California Charm.
short_description: California happiness meets everyday detail with this four-pack of shoe charms.
style_description: Nothing says Southern California like surfing, classic vans, and the outdoors, which is why Vans designed shoe charms to celebrate each of these unique joys. A surfboard, VW van, checker heart, and smiling daisy capture an easygoing way of life. The charms are made from metal to dress up or down, and water resistant so you can roam where you please. Finish the look with a pink and yellow flat, braided shoelace for an added pop of color.
details: Shoe charm and shoelace set 4 shoe charms with gold round clips and hardware Pair of 45" flat yellow and pink braided shoelaces Includes: checker heart charm, surfboard charm, bus charm, flower charm and shoelaces Contains small parts. Not intended for children under 12 years old

title: La Costa Lite Sandal

Add in a lightweight UltraCush Lite waffle outsole for comfort, and you've got a warm-weather staple like no other.
