subtitle: Their first high top.
short_description: Our iconic high top, constructed for the little ones with easy on-and-off access.
style_description: Redesigned for a perfect fit in the style of the original Sk8-Hi, the Infant Sk8-Hi Crib has been constructed especially for our littlest ones with single hook-and-loop closures and heel pulls for easy on-and-off access. In keeping with the Off the Wall fun, a print on the outsole mimics the iconic Vans waffle sole, and the addition of a Vans heel scab completes the classic look.
details: Legendary high top, Sidestripe shoe made for infants Single hook-and-loop closure Heel pull tab Suede and canvas materials Outsole print that mimics the classic Vans waffle sole

title: Premium Old Skool Gum Shoe
subtitle: Feel Something New.
short_description: The same iconic style, upgraded with refined materials and modern construction.
style_description: The Hip Hop Capsule features vibrant colors on gum soles that call back to sought-after colorways from the 2010s when underground hip hop took the Old Skool to new places. Our updated Premium build is the same iconic Old Skool silhouette refined for today with enhanced cushioning and an improved fit. Gum sidewalls, higher foxing tape and archival branding honor the original details of ‘90s era-Vans footwear.
details: Skate-inspired, low-top shoe Music Collection, Hip Hop Capsule 8 oz canvas and suede upper layers two textures Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Soft leather collar for enhanced comfort Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, 30% bio-based material Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66 Iconic leather Sidestripe™ insignia

title: Premium Half Cab Suede Shoe
subtitle: Half Cab, Refined.
short_description: Premium take on our legendary skate shoe, with an improved fit and enhanced cushioning.
style_description: Originally known as the Vans Steve Caballero, the Skate Half Cab was Vans' first signature skate shoe. It launched in 1988 with all the performance benefits skateboarders demand, including unparalleled grip and durable vulcanized construction. It went on to become one of the most iconic and culturally significant shoes in the history of skateboarding. Inspired by skateboarding's history of subverting the luxury space with adapted premium details, the Premium Half Cab Knit Shoe reinvents one of our greatest icons with a knit one-piece upper for a progressive twist on an all-time classic.
details: Signature mid top shoe One-piece, engineered knit upper Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Padded collar for enhanced support and comfort Higher sidewall with gloss finish Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, 30% bio-based material Signature waffle outsole pattern for reliable grip since '66

title: OTW Old Skool 36 Trail Vibram
subtitle: Old Skool. New Heights.
short_description: Optimized to go the distance with elevated breathability, grip, and a convenient magnetic closure.
style_description: The Old Skool Trail 36 Vibram features a FIDLOCK WINCH fastener with ratchet technology for precise tightening quick adjustability, a supportive and cushioned insole for shoe longevity, and a Vibram outsole for high traction. Top it off with a strong but lightweight upper, and this is the Old Skool made for speed with the durability to go the distance.
details: Iconic low-top shoe originally known as Style 36 Full Dyneema® Upper provides protective strength, breathability, and lightweight support FIDLOCK's WINCH fastener with ratchet technology combines precise tightening and magnetic fastening for quick adjustability Vans’ custom Vibram outsole provides a performance rubber compound offering high traction on wet and dry surfaces with lightweight functionality No sew construction Checkerboard lugs around perimeter, wrapping up toe and heel, and cube lugs in the center for additional traction on wet and dry terrain Clean midsole inspired by classic Vans vulc with a foxing stripe and subtle checkerboard detail OrthoLite® insole offers cushioning and support that stays consistent with use Iconic SideStripe™ Insignia Rugged rubber outsole with an EVA midsole

title: OTW Era 95 Moc Stitch Vibram
subtitle: Classic. Rugged. Refined.
short_description: Earthy materials and moccasin-inspired stitching redefine a Vans Icon.
style_description: This Era is reimagined with matte leather uppers and signature moccasin stitching for a rugged yet refined look. Fully monochromatic in black, from leather laces to metal eyelets and branding, earthy craftsmanship meets a modern finish. Durable foxing tape, an upgraded footbed, and seamless construction deliver lasting comfort. Anchoring this design is Vans’ first custom siped Vibram® outsole, a subtle reference to boat shoe heritage and classic deck-shoe traction reworked for grip across wet and dry ground.
details: Iconic low-top shoe originally known as Style 95 Vegetable-tanned leather uppers with moccasin stitching for a rugged, handcrafted look Monochromatic black Two sets of leather laces: black leather lace and two-tone black / white rope cord lace Monochromatic metal eyelets Foxing tape inspired by original 90's Osnaburg reinforced outsoles Upgraded footbed and refined construction combine for a more seamless fit Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived fromplants and it is USDA Certified Biobased OTW by Vans leather footbed Monochromatic black OTW logo heel scab First siped custom Vibram® outsole from Vans; micro-siped tread disperses water and adds grip on wet and icy surfaces

title: Mountain Mule Shoe
subtitle: Après style.
short_description: Stay comfortable and warm off the mountain with this winter-ready slide.
style_description: Whether fresh off the mountain or fresh out of bed, the Mountain Mule provides unparalleled comfort and style with the convenience of a slide. Slip it on and stay warm with 100-gram insulation. Plus, a Standard Snow MTE outsole offers reliable traction in all conditions.
details: Made with full grain and textile uppers. 100-gram insulation package for reliable warmth in cold temperatures Full rubber lugged outsole for traction on various surfaces and conditions.

title: Skate Rowley Shoe
subtitle: Nobody like him, nothing like it.
short_description: Rowan Zorilla's first signature shoe, with modern skate features and a vulcanized sole.
style_description: Celebrating 25 years of Geoff Rowleys legacy, the Skate Rowley Shoe is a nod to his original signature shoe while pushing skate culture forward. Built on the Rowley Pro foundation and redesigned for todays skaters, this vulcanized classic delivers everything modern skateboarders need. Honoring a skate icon who reshaped shoe design, this anniversary edition stays true to its roots while keeping up with the demands of the next generation.
details: Low-top skate shoe Inspired by the original 1999 Rowley skate shoe Durable leather and mesh upper for breathability and long-lasting wear DURACAP reinforced toe caps for added durability Higher sidewalls for increased protection and lasting performance Molded heel counter enhances support and stability. Internal tongue straps lock in your foot for better fit and board control SickStick rubber provides maximum grip and traction on your board PopCush footbeds offer impact protection and reduce leg fatigue for extended skating Iconic Sidestripe adds a signature Vans touch "66/99" honors Vans' 1966 founding and the Rowley shoe's 1999 debut Vulcanized sole for superior board feel and flexibility Lace-up closure for a secure and adjustable fit

title: OTW Half Cab 33 Vibram
subtitle: Skateboarding's DIY spirit uplifted with contrasting rich leathers.
short_description: Rich nubuck and statement leather combine to uplift one of skating's most influential shoes.
style_description: This reimagined Skate Half Cab takes one of skateboarding’s most influential silhouettes and pushes it into a new realm. Crocodile-embossed patent leather meets rich nubuck in a bold contrast that redefines what a skate shoe can look and feel like. Designed with premium detailing throughout, it features flat tonal eyelets, a branded leather footbed, and two sets of thick, slightly fuzzy wool laces for texture. Underfoot, Vans’ custom Vibram vulcanized outsole with tank tread delivers all-terrain grip.
details: Skate mid top shoe originally known as Style 33 Crocodile embossed patent leather and full-grain nubuck leather upper Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Two sets of thick wool laces with a Demitasse main lace and Classic Heritage Mustard second lace Flat tonal eyelets matching upper Branded leather footbed Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, it is made using at least 30% biobased PU foam partially derived from plants and it is USDA Certified Biobased Vans' custom Vibram vulcanized outsole with tank tread for all-terrain grip on wet and dry surfaces To keep your shoes in the best condition possible, avoid immersing in water and if wet, dry at room temperature out of the sun

title: OTW by Vans X S.R. Studio LA. CA. Authentic 44 Vibram
subtitle: Authentic, Contorted.
short_description: The Authentic undergoes a Sterling Ruby remix for a contrasting pattern and all-new Vibram tank tread.
style_description: Sterling Ruby's cyber yellow take on the original Vans silhouette. Inspired by the designs of marbled paper, the design provides an optical illusion that extends from the upper to the foxing for a cohesive, trippy visual design. A leather lining and padded collar combine with a cushioned insole to enhance the comfort of this original Vans silhouette. This shoe also marks the first release of the newly designed tank tread Vibram outsole. A black cotton S.R. Studio LA. CA. lace, a second cyber yellow lace, branded footbed, and custom S.R. Studio LA. CA. tag on the tongue makes this Authentic drip Sterling Ruby from the inside out.
details: Iconic low-top shoe originally known as Style 44 10 oz. drill canvas upper Leather collar lining and padded collar Black 8mm double-sided SR. Studio LA. CA. printed primary lace and additional cyber yellow 100% cotton lace Lace-up closure for an adjustable fit Higher sidewall with glossy finish Vans' custom Vibram vulc outsole with tank tread for all-terrain grip on wet and dry surfaces OTW black logo heel scab Sola Foam ADC (All-Day Comfort) insole for soft and durable cushioning, 30% bio-based material SR. Studio LA. CA. branded footbed Iconic canvas Sidestripe™ insignia Custom S.R. Studio LA. CA. packaging

subtitle: Custom. Since before that was a thing
short_description: A Vans tradition since 1966. Pick your shoe, colors, and patterns—make them yours.
style_description: Armed with a co-molded UltraCush midsole, updated RapidWeld detailing, a lightweight, die-cut rubber outsole, and a breathable Old Skool-inspired upper, this is the UltraRange—evolved. The UltraRange EXO is made with elevated textile and synthetic uppers. Pick your shoe, pick your colors and patterns, and make them yours.

title: Customs Old Skool Checkerboard Wide Shoe
subtitle: Custom. Since before that was a thing
short_description: A Vans tradition since 1966. Pick your shoe, colors, and patterns—make them yours.
style_description: CUSTOM. SINCE BEFORE THAT WAS A THING. Vans Customs have been a tradition since 1966, when Paul Van Doren made shoes with any fabric people brought by the shop. Today, the creativity is still in your hands. Pick your shoe, pick your colors and patterns, and make them yours. The Old Skool, the first shoe to bear the iconic leather sidestripe and the go-to style for every skate enthusiast, is a low-top lace-up style made with durable canvas, metal eyelets, a padded tongue and lining and Vans signature Waffle Outsole. Now they’re available on Vans Customs where each shoe can be personalized with leather and suede, various lace and eyelet colors, exclusive patterns available only in Customs, and the option to Upload Your Art or photos from your computer or smartphone.

style_description: The Toddlers Old Skool V reimagines our iconic Sidestripe shoe by swapping traditional laces for double hook-and-loop closures. title: Womens Encore Pro Snowboard Boot
style_description: With timeless style, comfort, and dependable control in equal measure, the Encore Pro is an advanced and versatile womens-specific BOA boot built to perform in all environments. It features our dual-zone BOA Fit System featuring Vans Custom Focus for unlimited, on-the-fly micro-adjustability, backed by the customizable comfort and heel hold of the Custom Slide Guide. Add in the V2 UltraCush Smartwool liner and V2 POPCUSH footbed, and the Encore Pro just might be your next favorite thing about snowboarding. details: TERRAIN: BACKCOUNTRY AND ALL-MOUNTAIN This boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails to steep, deep, untouched terrain. V2 UltraCush WITH SMARTWOOL LINER Made with soft, odor-resistant, moisture-managing Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush interior cushioning layer, this liner is warm yet breathable' helping to maintain a dry, thermoregulated microclimate inside your boot. V2 POPCUSH FOOTBED The dual-density POPCUSH construction includes an advanced 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, a nylex moisture-wicking top sheet, and an anti-fatigue coring design. BOA FIT SYSTEM FEATURING VANS CUSTOM FOCUS WITH SLIDE GUIDE Custom Focus features a high-power coiler dial (H4) and a mid-power remote dial (M+2) to control three zones of fit linked by Vans exclusive Custom Slide Guide, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for focused heel hold. V2 HARNESS - Customize your heel hold with the V2 harness as it works in tandem with the V2 liner to provide enhanced support and a personalized fit. INSTEP FLEX ZONE The Instep Flex Zone functions to maintain natural ankle flexion in your boot, whether in or out of your bindings. PLEASURECUFF The supple elasticity of the PleasureCuff delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit that keeps your calves supported. HEAT RETENTION 360o The thermal retention layer provides a 360¬∞ wrap of the toe box and between the outsole and the liner. title: Womens Viaje Range Edition X Hana Beaman Snowboard Boot
style_description: Hana Beaman is an icon of snowboarding. Her more than twenty-year career and journey from contest-focused Southern Californian to globally traveled and backcountry-experienced veteran reflects not only her ability to evolve with a constantly pivoting snowboard community, but also her passion to push the boundaries of what a professional athlete is capable of after years of industry ups and downs, travel miles, and heavy bails. This season, Hana put her mark on the Viaje Range Edition, the absolute outer rim and frontline of progressive snowboard boots for women. Designed to support overland adventures and uphill travel, the Range Editions Adaptive Range Mode features a Range Limiter and Rear Drop Cuff which can be unlocked to widen the top opening of the boot for a significantly expanded range of motion. Skinning a switchback, punching up for quick pow scores, ripping the snowmobile deep into the hills, or just going for a good old-fashioned hike, the Viaje Range Edition X Hana Beaman Snowboard Boot gets you there with less effort and more versatility than ever before. It is normal for V-Series liners to fit snug right out of the box. After several hours of use, the dual-density, heat-moldable core of the liner will begin to shape to your foot, creating unparalleled comfort and a uniquely perfect fit. We recommend that you purchase your regular size.
details: VANS X HANA BEAMAN COLLECTION TERRAIN: BACKCOUNTRY AND ALL-MOUNTAIN This boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails to steep, deep, untouched terrain. V3 RANGE EDITION UltraCush WITH THE NORTH FACE FLASHDRY LINER This liner offers all the same great features as its V3 counterpart, but adds the extended and lower-reaching PleasureCuff. When combined with the Adaptive Range Mode, expect an unmatched range of motion when hiking or skinning. V3 POPCUSH FOOTBED From the tri-density POPCUSH construction to the OrthoLite open-cell foam top layer, the V3 footbed provides unmatched comfort and performance. V3 WAFFLE SUPERENDURO OUTSOLE WITH ALL-TRAC COLD WEATHER RUBBER COMPOUND - The V3 SuperEnduro outsole is designed to offer maximum performance in and out of your bindings. With a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, a molded TPU toe pick, and an expanded impact absorption zone, there's no keeping up with this all-terrain apex predator. BOA FIT SYSTEM FEATURING VANS CUSTOM FOCUS PLUS WITH SLIDE GUIDE Custom Focus Plus features two high-power (H4) dials that control three zones of fit linked by Vans exclusive Custom Slide Guide, delivering concentrated fit around the instep area for superior heel hold. ADAPTIVE RANGE MODE The functional objective of Adaptive Range Mode is to widen the opening of the snowboard boot to allow for a more natural gait and extended range of motion on overland adventures or commuting uphill travel. Disengaging the Ride Mode strap opens the Rear Drop-Cuff and two-way stretch gore, providing significantly more calf articulation for longer strides and less wasted energy. WATERPROOF ZIPPER SHROUD + D RING This feature is a durable and weatherproof fabric shield that protects the lower part of your boot from snow, ice, and moisture.  It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow. EXOCAP MOLDED TOE PROTECTION- A molded plastic toe cap provides maximum protection and extra space in the toe box to keep your toes wiggling and warm. VANS FLEX CONTROL SYSTEM - Our removable, high-rebound Hytrel tongue stiffeners enable riders to custom-tune their boot flex. Keep both in for maximum support, use just one for increased lateral or medial response, or take them both out for a softer-flexing boot. As your boots soften up over time, add the tongue stiffeners back in to extend the life of your boots. WATERPROOF, BREATHABLE VALVES - These waterproof valves allow one-way moisture management by transporting moisture away from your foot, ensuring breathability and thermal regulation for dry, comfortable feet. INSTEP FLEX ZONE The Instep Flex Zone functions to maintain natural ankle flexion in your boot, whether in or out of your bindings. POWERCUFF STRAP Power is the operative word. It provides extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response, giving riders customizable levels of engagement. UPPER MATERIALS Leather, textile, and synthetic FLEX RATING 6-9 SKILL LEVEL Intermediate, advanced

title: Hi-Standard Pro X Jill Perkins Snowboard Boot
style_description: For this season, we go back-to-back with the Hi-Standard Pro, a versatile workhorse and all-around team favorite, enjoying an exercise in creative exploration by some of the most unique personalities on our global roster. Tapping into Jill Perkinss constant pursuit of gassing up her friends to Benny Urbans tasteful skate influence, each rendition is helplessly original, true to who they are, and, frankly, we cannot get enough of the romance that is Vans Snows diverse cast of characters, this winters Hi-Standard Pro lineup highlights our mission of empowering the snow community to be their most authentic selves' whether you already know who that is or are still in the process of figuring it out. Featuring our V2 package, including a V2 UltraCush Smartwool liner, a V2 POPCUSH footbed, and a Waffle Pro outsole, the Hi-Standard Pro X Jill Perkins Snowboard Boot continues to capitalize on the intersection of performance and self-discovery. It is normal for V-Series liners to fit snug right out of the box. After several hours of use, the dual-density, heat-moldable core of the liner will begin to shape to your foot, creating unparalleled comfort and a uniquely perfect fit. We recommend that you purchase your regular size.
details: VANS X JILL PERKINS COLLECTION TERRAIN: ALL-MOUNTAIN AND PARK/STREET This boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and powder to urban environments, and everything in between. V2 UltraCush WITH SMARTWOOL LINER Made with soft, odor-resistant, moisture-managing Smartwool Merino wool and an UltraCush interior cushioning layer, this liner is warm yet breathable' helping to maintain a dry, thermoregulated microclimate inside your boot. V2 POPCUSH FOOTBED The dual-density POPCUSH construction includes an advanced 3D-molded anatomical shape, airflow perforations, a nylex moisture-wicking top sheet, and an anti-fatigue coring design. V2 WAFFLE PRO OUTSOLE WITH ALL-TRAC COLD WEATHER RUBBER COMPOUND The V2 Waffle Pro is built for both on- and off-snowboard performance. Uncompromising natural flex and a weight-reducing, impact-resisting UltraCush midsole provide incredible boardfeel, while a Vans-exclusive lug tread pattern and rubber compound give you the grip and traction you need to scramble the side country with confidence. V2 HARNESS - Customize your heel hold with the V2 harness as it works in tandem with the V2 liner to provide enhanced support and a personalized fit. WATERPROOF, BREATHABLE VALVES - These waterproof valves allow one-way moisture management by transporting moisture away from your foot, ensuring breathability and thermal regulation for dry, comfortable feet. POWERCUFF STRAP Power is the operative word. It provides extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response, giving riders customizable levels of engagement. INSTEP FLEX ZONE The Instep Flex Zone functions to maintain natural ankle flexion in your boot, whether in or out of your bindings. PLEASURECUFF The supple elasticity of the PleasureCuff delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit that keeps your calves supported. HEAT RETENTION 360o The thermal retention layer provides a 360¬∞ wrap of the toe box and between the outsole and the liner. This essential layer keeps heat in and cold out, ensuring all-day warmth and comfort. UPPER MATERIALS Textile and synthetic FLEX RATING 5-6 SKILL LEVEL Intermediate, advanced

title: Verse X Blake Paul Range Edition Snowboard Boot
style_description: Watch Blake Paul ride a snowboard and it will come as no surprise that he grew up in the shadow of the Grand Teton in Jackson, Wyoming. A resort as gnarly as the history of the West, the incredibly steep, variable, and challenging terrain of Jackson Hole was Blake’s playground as a youth, laying the freestyle foundation that he is known for today. This season, Blake brings his easy-going outlook and unmatched backcountry style to the Verse Range Edition. Designed to support overland adventures and uphill travel, the Verse X Blake Paul Range Edition is a functional and reliable addition to your backcountry toolkit. The Adaptive Range Mode features a Rear Drop-Cuff to widen the top opening of the boot for a significantly expanded range of motion, and Blake’s signature colorway offers a unique look you won’t find anywhere else. Skinning a switchback, ripping the snowmobile deep into the hills, or just going for a good old-fashioned hike—this Verse Range Edition gets you there with less effort, more protection, and unmatched style.
details: VANS X BLAKE PAUL COLLECTION TERRAIN: BACKCOUNTRY AND ALL-MOUNTAIN – This boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails to steep, deep, untouched terrain. V3 ULTRACUSH™ WITH THE NORTH FACE FLASHDRY™ LINER – This UltraCush™ liner incorporates the North Face’s FlashDry™ technology to keep you dry by eliminating moisture as fast as possible. V3 POPCUSH™ FOOTBED – From the tri-density POPCUSH™ construction to the OrthoLite® open-cell foam top layer, the V3 footbed provides unmatched comfort and performance. V3 WAFFLE SUPERENDURO OUTSOLE WITH ALL-TRAC COLD WEATHER RUBBER COMPOUND - The V3 SuperEnduro outsole is designed to offer maximum performance in and out of your bindings. With a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, a molded TPU toe pick, and an expanded impact absorption zone, there’s no keeping up with this all-terrain apex predator. VANS HYBRID PLUS BOA® WITH CUSTOM SLIDE GUIDE – The Hybrid Plus system expands the range of flex control from the original Hybrid BOA® configuration by adding an extra BOA® lace that passes around the back of the boot and across the instep to optimize the lines of pull and maximize the flex control capabilities. ADAPTIVE RANGE MODE – The functional objective of Adaptive Range Mode is to widen the opening of the snowboard boot to allow for a more natural gait and extended range of motion on overland adventures or commuting uphill travel. Disengaging the Ride Mode strap opens the Rear Drop-Cuff and two-way stretch gore, providing significantly more calf articulation. This allows for longer strides and less wasted energy. WATERPROOF ZIPPER SHROUD + D RING – This feature is a durable and weatherproof fabric shield that protects the lower part of your boot from snow, ice, and moisture.  It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow. VANS FLEX CONTROL SYSTEM - Our removable, high-rebound Hytrel® tongue stiffeners enable riders to custom-tune their boot flex. Keep both in for maximum support, use just one for increased lateral or medial response, or take them both out for a softer-flexing boot. As your boots soften up over time, add the tongue stiffeners back in to extend the life of your boots. EXOCAP MOLDED TOE PROTECTION – A molded plastic toe cap provides maximum protection and extra space in the toe box to keep your toes wiggling and warm. WATERPROOF, BREATHABLE VALVES - These waterproof valves allow one-way moisture management by transporting moisture away from your foot, ensuring breathability and thermal regulation for dry, comfortable feet. INSTEP FLEX ZONE – The Instep Flex Zone functions to maintain natural ankle flexion in your boot, whether in or out of your bindings. POWERCUFF STRAP – Power is the operative word. It provides extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response, giving riders customizable levels of engagement. MATERIALS – Leather, textile, and synthetic uppers FLEX RATING – 6-9 SKILL LEVEL – Advanced

title: Hi-Standard X Mike Rav Snowboard Boot
style_description: The guy who looks like he’s having the most fun? That would be Rav. Like many before him, Mike Ravelson’s upbringing on east coast ice meant that he became a master of board control out of pure necessity. But rather than apply those skills to standard trickery, he takes an approach to all terrain that’s truly one-of-a-kind. He purposely blurs the line between technical skill and letting loose.
details: TERRAIN: PARK/STREET – This boot has been adapted to the technical terrain of parks, transitions, and urban environments. LINERLESS TECHNOLOGY – Lightweight construction and a slimmed-down upper reduce the boot’s overall size and weight while an increased internal foam package provides a softer, more cushioned feel. V1 POPCUSH™ FOOTBED – Single-density POPCUSH™ construction combines advanced 3D anatomical shaping, a nylex moisture-wicking top sheet, and an anti-fatigue coring design for tuned energy return and the highest levels of impact cushioning. V1 WAFFLE LUG OUTSOLE WITH ALL-TRAC COLD WEATHER RUBBER COMPOUND – This aggressive reverse waffle lug pattern pays tribute to the timeless vulcanized look that put Vans® on the map while delivering high levels of boardfeel and all-condition traction. POWERCUFF STRAP – Power is the operative word. It provides extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response, giving riders customizable levels of engagement. INSTEP FLEX ZONE – The Instep Flex Zone functions to maintain natural ankle flexion in your boot, whether in or out of your bindings. PLEASURECUFF™ – The supple elasticity of the PleasureCuff™ delivers a cushioned, comfortable fit that keeps your calves supported. HEAT RETENTION 360o – The thermal retention layer provides a 360° wrap of the toe box and between the outsole and the liner. This essential layer keeps heat in and cold out, ensuring all-day warmth and comfort. UPPER MATERIALS – Textile and synthetic FLEX RATING – 1-2 SKILL LEVEL – Intermediate, advanced

title: Hi-Country & Hell-Bound Snowboard Boot
style_description: The Hi-Country & Hell-Bound is optimized to take your street or backcountry shred game to the next level. Boasting key performance features like a V3 POPCUSH footbed, custom flex tuning, and a V3 SuperEnduro Waffle outsole paired with unmatched moisture management, this all-terrain boot will not only take you where you want to go, but it'll give you the tools to show up in style. It is normal for V-Series liners to fit snug right out of the box. After several hours of use, the dual-density, heat-moldable core of the liner will begin to shape to your foot, creating unparalleled comfort and a uniquely perfect fit. We recommend that you purchase your regular size.
details: TERRAIN: BACKCOUNTRY AND ALL-MOUNTAIN This boot has been optimized for versatility, from parks and rails to steep, deep, untouched terrain. V3 UltraCush WITH THE NORTH FACE FLASHDRY LINER This UltraCush liner incorporates The North Faces FlashDry technology to keep you dry by eliminating moisture as fast as possible. V3 POPCUSH FOOTBED From the tri-density POPCUSH construction to the OrthoLite open-cell foam top layer, the V3 footbed provides unmatched comfort and performance. V3 WAFFLE SUPERENDURO OUTSOLE WITH ALL-TRAC COLD WEATHER RUBBER COMPOUND - The V3 SuperEnduro outsole is designed to offer maximum performance in and out of your bindings. With a multi-directional tread design, surface-level texturing, a molded TPU toe pick, and an expanded impact absorption zone, there's no keeping up with this all-terrain apex predator. V3 HARNESS - This advanced support harness delivers our highest level of support to the ankle and instep, keeping the V3 liner and boot shell locked in and connected. WATERPROOF ZIPPER SHROUD + D RING - This feature is a durable and weatherproof fabric shield that protects the lower part of your boot from snow, ice, and moisture.  It also features a metal D-ring for securely fastening your pant gaiters to lock out snow. VANS FLEX CONTROL SYSTEM - Our removable, high-rebound Hytrel tongue stiffeners enable riders to custom-tune their boot flex. Keep both in for maximum support, use just one for increased lateral or medial response, or take them both out for a softer-flexing boot. As your boots soften up over time, add the tongue stiffeners back in to extend the life of your boots. WATERPROOF, BREATHABLE VALVES - These waterproof valves allow one-way moisture management by transporting moisture away from your foot, ensuring breathability and thermal regulation for dry, comfortable feet. POWERCUFF STRAP Power is the operative word. It provides extra support at the top of the boot for increased stability and response, giving riders customizable levels of engagement. INSTEP FLEX ZONE The Instep Flex Zone functions to maintain natural ankle flexion in your boot, whether in or out of your bindings. HEAT RETENTION 360o The thermal retention layer provides a 360¬∞ wrap of the toe box and between the outsole and the liner. This essential layer keeps heat in and cold out, ensuring all-day warmth and comfort. UPPER MATERIALS Textile and synthetic FLEX RATING 5-8 SKILL LEVEL Intermediate, advanced
